Summary Heading: Beat the Anaheim resort fees! This place is great!
Summary: A very nice place away from the Anaheim "resort" fees. A huge, clean, well appointed suite with a very comfortable bed with privacy doors. The grounds are very well kept in a quiet part of town about a mile off the 57. Close to plenty of food and shopping and about 15 minutes from all the Anaheim attractions. Free wifi and secure parking. Well worth the price. Oh, the staff are awesome! Breanna (?) was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and that Briana provided you with excellent service. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: One of the worst hotel in all my travels
Summary: The room was dirty when we arrived and if you don't stay at least 7 days, you are not entitled to room cleaning. Also, you have to ask for clean towels every day, because they don't change them. The reception is not at all friendly and does not care about pleasing the guest. I do not recommend and will never return to this hotel.
Manager Response: First and foremost, we want to thank you for taking the time to leave us a review as without them we cannot continue to improve our services. It is very unfortunate that we did not meet your expectations as our goal is to exceed them. Our staff works day in and day out to make your stay as enjoyable as possible by providing our guests with the most spacious suites in the area along with complimentary breakfast and a complimentary social hour where we serve hot and cold  hors d'oeuvres.  We would have loved the opportunity to make it right during your stay rather than during the review process. We hope you allow us the opportunity to serve you once again and we guarantee you will not be disappointed.

Summary: Once again, Chase Suites was the perfect location for our stay.  The room with a kitchen helped keep costs of eating out down and the beds were very comfortable.  The free breakfasts were very good and the staff helpful and polite.  I do miss the hospitality hour on Thursdays.  Although housekeeping does not clean the room during your stay any longer it was not a big deal.  If we needed anything, we could just call.  We were there for 6 days and we plan on staying there again when visiting family next time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We are proud to announce we have brought back our social hour this week (you just missed it... but rest assured it will be here when you come back!) Making sure you had a fantastic stay is our number 1 priority and we are ecstatic we did that. Thank you again....see you soon!

Summary: Quiet, clean and away from the bustle of tourism that Anaheim can be. I was in town to visit family and glad to find a nice option in my hometown. The room was clean, spacious and it was quiet in the evening, just what I needed to rest after a busy day with family.
Room tip: The parking spaces were a short walk from my room, but I didn't mind that, the hotel is sort of...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review really appreciate it. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We take pride in providing you with the best service and the best rooms in town. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We truly enjoyed our stay here. The staff was great and friendly. At check in Isaiah was pleasant and gave us recommendations on where to eat. The rooms were very spacious, it was basically a small apartment. Breakfast was great, I think they use real eggs which was definitely a nice treat as most of the hotels we have stayed at have eggs that seem frozen from a bag. We didn’t get to use the pool but it looked very nice. Briana was very friendly during check out, she mentioned they are going to be bringing back the evening reception during the week they used to have before Covid. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you!!! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and are so happy to hear you loved us as much as we loved serving you. Thank you again and we will see you soon!

Summary: What a dump.  $330 per night for lumpy beds, worn-out towels, furniture from the 80’s.  Two stars offered for the breakfast.  Cheap soap and other room amenities.   Find another place to stay.  Don’t waste your money.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us your candid review. We appreciate your comments as without them we cannot continue to improve. We do sincerely apologize if your thought our hotel and/or service was not up to your expectations, that is clearly not what we are about. We strive every day to make it a great stay for our guests every time. Our made from scratch complimentary breakfast is something we take very seriously.  Martha who has been with our hotel for over 25 years selects a different menu rotation every day and having a delicious breakfast for our guests is something she takes pride in. We take pride in being our guests home away from home and again we appreciate your comments as we can only grow from them. Thank you for staying with us and we hope we have another opportunity to serve you and hope your experience will be different.

Summary: I can't really speak to price because I have no idea what an average room in the LA area should be.  But the room was excellent.  The staff were especially fantastic.  Would like to give a special mention to the women preparing and serving breakfast.  It was delicious, they were delightful and definitely the highlight of my stay.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. We are so very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for commenting on our breakfast staff, they work so hard to make sure they deliver our guests a delicious breakfast every morning and we love when they get recognized by our guest for their tremendous work. We think they are fantastic as well :-) Thank you again and we hope to see you in the near future when visiting the Brea area.

Summary: Depending where your suite is facing, the highway is a bit noisy but nothing extreme.  Paper towels would have been nice in the kitchen.  Excellent breakfast, friendly staff, and nice comfortable clean rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We love that you loved our complimentary homemade breakfast! We appreciate your comments as without them we cannot continue to provide our guests with even better service every time. We hope to see you again when in the Brea area.

Summary: I love staying at the Chase Suites Hotel in Brea, California. This is my 3rd time staying here and it is the only place I will stay when visiting family in Orange County California.  The rooms are amazing.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you love our hotel. We work very hard to make this your home away from home. We appreciate you choosing us every time and can't wait to serve you again in the future!

Summary: My only comment about the handicap room that we had was the tub. With a mobility disability it was not safe to use but I had no choice. A person in a wheelchair could not have used a tub unless they were very strong and had help. Otherwise everything else was great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us, we are so happy to hear you had a great stay! See you next time you are in the Brea area again.

Summary: We have stayed may times in the past for baseball. it have been 5+ years since we have stayed here. it have not changed still awesome, breakfast is to die for. place is clean. nice pool. great staff. grounds is clean
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: It was advertised as outstanding, but, Old and dirty is the best description for the hotel, my room 104 had stain carpets and cigarette burns on the sofa, housekeeping is only once a week , and you have to schedule it 24 hrs in advance. it  was a suite for 5 people but it only was ready for 2. I had to leave my car out of the hotel property because there wasn't enough parking spots for everybody.
Manager Response: First and foremost we want to apologize if we fell short of your expectations. This is never our intention. We would have loved the opportunity to make it right while you were staying with us, if you would have made us aware. If you are ever in the Brea area again, we would love for you to give us another opportunity and we rest assured knowing we would exceed your expectations with our spacious suites, our amazing complimentary breakfast we make inhouse, our complimentary wifi and great service--- that is what we're here for. Thank you again for your candid review as without it we cannot continue to grow and learn.

Summary Heading: Quick trip to California from Las Vegas for business and pleasure
Summary: Made a quick trip to California to do some banking & visit some friends. Very convenient location for us. Easy check-in with reservations. Pleasant grounds, spacious living room. Comfortable king bed. Our adult daughter slept on the hideabed not so comfortable and motion sensored light switch kept coming on when she rolled over keeping her awake. Bathroom quite small for 3 people and no privacy door between bedroom and vanity dressing area. Motion sensored lights go out when taking a quiet, still bath. Shower head old and didn’t work real well. Air-conditioner leaked all over bathroom floor but maintenance was prompt and curious to fix it.  Used jacuzzi. Nice to relax in but very hot and didn’t bubble very much (very old).  Breakfast was very nice. Lots of options. We would stay
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your stay. We are happy you thought our rooms were comfortable and that you took advantage of our fabulous complimentary breakfast buffet.  Thank you for making us aware during your stay about your AC and are so very happy to hear we fixed it to your standards. We really hope to have you again when you return to the Orange County area!

Summary: After our room was given away at another chain hotel, Chase had a room at the same cost as the previous location. However- this location was better suited to our needs in every way. Reasonable rates, clean room with double queen beds and a superior breakfast. You could actually dine in! And it’s a pet friendly hotel to boot! Friendly staff, on site laundry, and pool/spa. Convenient to Orange County venues as well as surrounding cities and/or counties (LA, SB, RV).
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review! We loved serving you and hope when you're in the Brea area again we will be your hotel of choice!

Summary: Rooms are a nice size and were very clean.  Customer service on-site is very friendly and helpful.  I really enjoyed the breakfast variety and free wine in the evening to wind down or meet other guests.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review of your stay. We are ecstatic to hear you enjoyed our complimentary made from scratch breakfast buffet. We hope to see you again when in the Brea area again.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel 4 times now in the last 4 years. I think the same person is still putting the breakfast together. I've never had any issues with this hotel, I wish all the hotels I stayed at were as nich and  as well run as this one. The staff is always helpful and friendly. I usually stay here for business but wouldn't hesitate to book a room here for my personal needs.
Manager Response: Thank you!! Yes, Martha has been with us for over 30 years, she is amazing and so happy to hear you enjoyed it. Thank you for your loyalty, it is guests such as yourself that keep us going and motivated to continue providing the best accommodations and best service around. See you next time you're in town, we love serving you!

Summary: Great place stayed a whole week with my family and the breakfast is great the pool is nice and the suits are good size and nice they bright towels when we asked and it has a home vibe outside the rooms
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review! We loved having you here and loved you enjoyed your time at our pool and enjoyed our homemade complimentary breakfast. We can't wait for you to be back when in the Brea area again!

Summary: The room was a but musty when I checked in, but several windows can be opened, and the air soon seemed fresh.  I didn't use the kitchen, but it is well equipped.  Television is hard to figure out.  Bed and pillows were good; plenty of towels.  Breakfast was outstanding -- good variety from one day to the next.  Parking is tricky; the lot fills up in early evening, so I had to park near the office on two night.  The parking spaces are very narrow, so if you have luggage in the passenger area, you have to unload it before you pull into the parking space.  But the pluses outweigh the minuses, and if you have a reason to stay in this part of Orange County, Chase Suite Hotel is a good choice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review!  We are so happy we were able to meet your needs while your visit with us! We hope to see you again in the near future when visiting Orange County again!

Summary: My stay at Chase Suites was comfortable.  The service was excellent. Your pillows are great! The delicious complimentary breakfasts were fabulous.  I ended up boarding my dog, but it was nice that you allowed my pet.  Two things I would like to see change is trucks/cars parked in handicap spaces that did not have a handicap placard.  Also, large trucks that blocked a parking space.  Second, cutting off our keycard on the morning that we were leaving to get checked out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad that overall you had a great experience and our freshly made breakfast was fabulous. We will discuss the parking situation in hopes of avoiding that issue in the future. I am sorry about your keycard as it should of worked until our check-out time of 11:00 AM. We look forward to welcoming you back again, hopefully sooner than 30 years this time.

Summary: Chase Suite Hotel is one of the many hotels I've stayed in. I can say that this hotel is very worth the price we payed for. From the location of the hotel to the exterior design of the rooms to the interior design of the room to the furniture used and availability of appliances, Chase Suite Hotel gives you the vibe. Will definitely recommend this to my friends.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had an amazing stay. We strive each and every day to make it a memorable stay for our guests every time. We appreciate your kind comments and hope to see you again in the near future, we will be waiting for you!

Summary: Very good Apartment Hotel suite with good breakfast. Very helpful staff members in all areas of service. Bathroom Towels & Kitchen facilites provided. Coffee making machine was provided Good heated swimming pool & Jaccuzi - Outdoors
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to welcome you again when visiting the Brea area!

Summary: From the moment at check-in Jocelyn was great and was very informative. The whole staff actually was pretty awesome, Isaiah and Martha were the other employees we dealt with. Breakfast was hearty and the eggs looked like they were the real thing. WiFi was fast, plenty of parking near my room every time. I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, we loved serving you!  We will see you again on your next visit to Brea.

Summary: IT IS THE WORST MOTEL IN THE WORLD. The room was small, dirty and stinky. Fleas, roaches and bed bugs were all over the place. I’d rather live on the street than stay in this motel again. I got bit all over my body. They refused to talk to me or refund my money. Hotel manager was no where. I WILL NEVER STAY IN THIS MOTEL. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
Manager Response: This is a very suspicious review and we are concerned and have reported this as  1. We have the largest suites in the area  2. We are not a motel we are an all suite property  3. We have not had any reports of this happening at our hotel.   We have reason to believe who ever wrote this review was deliberately trying to hurt the amazing reputation we have.   We take pride in having clean and spacious suites and strive to give the best service around. Our breakfast staff shows up every day and is proud to serve the complimentary homemade breakfast for our guests. Along with with our year round heated pool and complimentary Wi-Fi, the Chase Suite Hotel Brea is the perfect place to visit while on business or if you just want visit for fun. We are your home away from home and love serving you.

Summary: My spouse and I thoroughly enjoyed our 7-night stay at Chase Suite Hotel. Our room with a full kitchen was nicely decorated, clean, and spacious. The bed was very comfortable. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful. We appreciated that the staff wore masks and deep cleaned the rooms between bookings. The daily breakfast was quite good: tasty scrambled eggs, bacon/sausage, yogurt, cereals, etc. The only problem we encountered involved opening the windows for ventilation. It took two of us to open a window. We will definitely stay at the hotel again when we return to Orange County. Thank you, Staff,  for making our stay wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review! We loved having you here! We take pride in providing the best service in town and also in our delicious homemade breakfast, we are so glad you loved it!. We hope to see you during your next visit to the Brea area, we'll be waiting! :-)

Summary Heading: An excellent place to stay in Brea
Summary: Positives: Our full kitchen suite was spacious, quiet, very clean and with a nice comfy bed. Staff was friendly and helpful and the hot breakfast was well prepared and very tasty. The location is excellent, close to freeways and close to restaurants and cafes in all price ranges.  Negatives: The full kitchen units are poorly equipped with just a couple of pots and a small fry pan, not suitable for cooking a full meal. You can scramble some eggs or heat soup but nothing more complicated than that. Also, if you are worried about COVID, you should know that although there is a clearly posted mask policy, it is not enforced, and most of the people walking into the breakfast area or waiting in line for self-service food will not be wearing masks.  Summary: Despite the negatives, we
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review, we loved having you here. We also appreciate your candid feedback and please rest assured we are following our county's safety guidelines each and every day as Orange County has made masks optional.  We appreciate you and can't wait for your next visit to our hotel!

Summary: We were doing some major remodeling at our house and needed a place to stay. The location is great - next to Whole Foods, Starbucks, and several restaurants. The room was clean and quiet, and it was great to have our dog with us too. Kitchen had all that we needed but no ice. Air conditioning worked great but was very loud. Shower had plenty of hot water and the bathroom had a vent fan. We would stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review and glad that overall you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Staff helpful and all facilities in great condition. Pool and jacuzzi well maintained. All the breakfast items were delicious. Due to covid19 the rooms were only cleaned in request, which is actually our prefence.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Spic n span. Full kitchen a plus. Clean clean clean what else can I say. When it’s clean, everything is comfortable! Updated carpets beddings drapes fixtures bathrooms and all. Quiet neighborhood. Beautiful city. Will def stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with friendly staff
Summary: Stayed at the hotel last minute for 2 days and couldn’t be happier. Going to be staying another 2 nights due to last minute changes in plans and still no issues with getting accommodations. Anthony was working the front desk and really made the process painless and even gave me options on rooms.  Definitely recommended for anyone traveling through the area!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I am glad that our team took great care of you and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Beautiful small hotel. Room was very comfortable and spacious. Staff was gracious and very helpful. I liked the apartment style setting. My minor recommendations/comments: It would be great if you offered a different rate for extended stay if a guest needed to stay for over a month for example. Lost internet connection often and had to reconnect to accommodate my work needs. Heard lots of movements/sounds when someone was in the room above.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay overall and appreciate your feedback. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Very nice location and hotel. I'd stay again. Only two small issues I ran across. One is that parking is very limited. If you get there too late in the day, you may have to park in the adjacent office park next door. Second, if you stay in one of the suites next to the main road, it can be noisy during rush hours. Overall, i would recommend this hotel
Manager Response: We really appreciate you leaving us a review about your stay, we love that you would stay with us again!

Summary: I’ve stayed before and I like this little spot for it’s convenient location and comfortable suites.  I think maintenance may have slipped a bit since last time.  Nothing serious, just plumbing issues and missing racks in the fridge.  I reported the running toilet because of the wasted water and they did repair that the next day. Sink wouldn’t drain well either.  But grounds are well kept and it wouldn’t deter me from staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay, without your comments we cannot continue to improve our services. We are so happy to hear you thought our suites were comfortable and hope to see you again in the near future! Thank you for always choosing us when in the Brea area.

Summary Heading: This place is nice and CLEAN!!
Summary: I was really happy with my stay. I usually never leave reviews but this was the best stay. Staff was friendly at check in. Food was real cooked food at breakfast. The room was great and spacious. And the thing that really stood out to me was how clean it was. I stay at a lot of hotels for work and this was hands down the cleanest I’ve seen in a while. Also the property was extremely quiet, it made me wanna be quiet too lol. Hope to be back in the area soon so I can stay again.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! It sounds like you had a fabulous stay and that makes us so happy to hear!! We strive each and every day to make sure our guests are satisfied and absolutely love to hear when we do.  We appreciate you and will see you soon!

Summary: We loved our stay at this hotel.  The hotel is spacious and nice.  Breakfast they serve is so great.  It is always good quality and various selections.  If we needed anything, they were very prompt to bring the stuff (extra towels, trash bags, etc.).  We would love to come to this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We always strive to provide the best service every time. We love that you loved our homemade breakfast we take pride in serving it every morning. Thank you again for staying with us and hope to see you very soon!

Summary: A spacious comfortable room...like being at home in terms of privacy and quiet.  This was our first big trip since the pandemic. We  were somewhat nervous about travel and people contact.  No elevator and no lobby area  was a big plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We appreciate the review and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My room was Very nice and super clean, I was there for business I felt very safe. Isiah was very helpful and accommodating he really made my stay easy and he took care of all my needs that I asked for.  Thank you again isiah.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We appreciate your business and your kind remarks. We think Isaiah is awesome too and will make sur he sees your review. We loved having you here and will see you soon once you are in the Brea area again. Thank you again!

Summary: This is a hidden gem. Rooms were spacious and clean.  Pool was small but nice.  Hot free breakfast was great.  The staff was wonderful.  Would definitely stay here next time in area.  Beds were comfortable.  It was like an apartment    Big living room.   Would like to see grab bars in showers.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing us! Our driving force is making sure our guests have an amazing stay every time and we are so happy to hear you loved our hotel. We hope to see you again in the near future when in the Brea area.

Summary: Nice clean and a restful night!  Will be back soon! Can't wait to go back.. this time we'll be using tge pool area. Staff were very nice and friendly. I hope to take my family with me since tge rooms were very spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay! Your satisfaction is our #1 goal. We loved having you here...see you soon!

Summary: Love this Hotel, it’s Clean it’s spacious my family & my self we were very comfortable. Definitely will be staying here again. Breakfast was delicious. Everything about this hotel was amazing. Thank you again!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We love to hear when our guests have an amazing stay. We are so happy to hear you were able to enjoy our homemade breakfast--we think it's delicious as well. Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review and we hope to see you again when visiting the Brea area!

Summary: I truly enjoyed this suite with my family. It was spacious, located in a great shopping neighborhood. All you can eat breakfast, heated pool private 2 hour pool time and full kitchen. I will be back soon
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review about your stay, we are so happy you enjoyed it! We love that you were able to take advantage of our made from scratch hot breakfast and our pool area that is OPEN :-) We thank you again and can't wait to have you back as our guest when visiting the Brea area.

Summary: This property boasts " A Modedrn Resendential Style Hotel."  Although the property appears to be nothing that converted apartments. Interiors were a pleasant suprise with just the right amount of modern touches without overdoing it with tech.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We love to hear you enjoyed our spacious suites (which happen to be the largest in the area). We hope you also had a chance to try our breakfast that is made from scratch daily. Thank you again and we hope to see you when you are visiting the Brea area again!

Summary: The stay and the staff at this hotel was amazing. Cleaningness of the hotel was perfect. The room was amazing. Better than what I expected it to be. Already booked another stay for June. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to hear you had an amazing stay!! It is our number one goal to provide the service you deserve every time and can't wait for you to come back in June!

Summary: My husband and I wanted to take our son on a quiet week stay to help him get over his stress from online school as he is only 4 and taking it’s toll  Not only did we love how the room looks, it was quiet and just what we needed.  Although I was a bit worried about a 500 fee for loud noises when I have a kid who laughs a bit loudly. That rule should be looked into and only charge people who actually make noise like a party and not a kid playing. Overall wonderful stay. Beauty rooms, clean, quiet, and everything we needed was a drive away !
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so happy to hear we could be your quick getaway from all the hustle and bustle. Our goal is to exceed our guests expectations every time and we love that we were able to do that. We hope you come back and visit us again very soon, we will be here waiting! Thank you again!

Summary: Wonderful place. Breakfast is hot and changes a bit daily.  You pick it up and have to take it back to your room to eat, but it is hot and includes coffee and juice.  Kitchen was well stocked and clean.  We were even able to entertain friends on one night of our three month stay.  Comfy beds and sofa.  Parking can get a bit tight at night.    There was no housekeeping during our 3 night stay due to Covid, but you could call if you needed toilet paper or towels.  One minor problem I had was trash.  We did a lot of cooking in the unit and generated a lot of trash.  We left it out in the morning, but when we returned after lunch the trash was still outside the door.  So we threw it away in one of the trash cans located outside.  I only saw two of these.  Suggestion to the hotel,
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to hear your stay was a great one! We work very hard day in and out to do everything we can to make all of our guests feel like this is their home away from home. Thank you for your observations as without them we cannot continue to get better. We appreciate you and we hope to see you again when in the Brea area, we loved having you stay with us!

Summary: Enjoyed my stay at the Chase Suites Hotel in Brea, and will definitely return in the future.  I had an opportunity to spend time with my daughter.  We were able catch up and share, while enjoying an uninterrupted dinner.  We were also able to deal with a problem she had been experiencing, and it was great. The drinks/snacks were a bit pricy.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for coming to visit us! It was our pleasure to serve you. We are so happy to hear you were able to spend time with family especially during these unprecedented times. Thank you again for your kind review and hope to see you again when in the Brea area.

Summary: Huge rooms for a reasonable price.  Staff was always courteous.  Very quiet and comfortable.  My only criticism was that the rooms were outdated, and could use updates.  But overall, a very pleasant stay.  We'll come back here the next time we're in the area.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. We are ecstatic to hear you loved the size of our suites. We do have the largest suites in the area :-)  Thank you for choosing us, we understand there are many choices and feel honored to have had you as our guest. See you soon!

Summary: I love the comfort, And it was nice to have a complementary breakfast that was very good.  It is very quiet and close to eateries. I will continue to stay here for my business trips because it has great amenities!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had a great stay, that is our #1 goal every time. We pride ourselves in our delicious made from scratch breakfast and our spacious suites. Our proximity to many eateries and quiet suburban setting is a huge advantage when you stay with us. We look forward to having you back as our guest next time you're in the Brea area again!

Summary: After having to evacuate our home due to a wildfire, we were very pleasantly surprised to find this local pet friendly hotel. The staff was very friendly and the included breakfasts were hearty and delicious. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, it give us great pleasure to here you enjoyed your stay during such a hard time. Thank you for allowing us to be your home away from home.

Summary: I had a bit of business in Brea and found this hotel listed.  The location was excellent for my needs.  This was my first stay at a Chase hotel, and I enjoyed the experience.  The room was clean and comfortable.  It was a bit noisy at times.  While folks would gather out on the walkways to smoke, it didn't bother me -- where else are you going to go if you smoke?   Breakfast was simple, and the serving team was pleasant and accommodating.  I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing us! We are so happy you had a great stay. Our guests satisfaction is our #1 goal each and every day. We can't wait to see you again in the near future when visiting the Brea area.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Chase Suite Hotel in Brea, California.  My room was clean.  There was a bed area, a living area with a small kitchenette-type area, and a nice bathroom.  I was very pleased with the room and the location.  And the breakfast was large and great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We are so happy to hear your had a great stay. Our guests satisfaction is our driver each and every day. Thank you again!

Summary: Needed a couple nights while my place was being fumigated. I also work from home and this place was perfect for my needs. Spacious with all the accommodations you might need. I had my dog with me as well and there is plenty of grass and pathways for walks. Had a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Glad to hear you enjoyed our spacious suites, we hope to see you on your next visit. Please give us a call if we can be of any service.

Summary: The room was dirty the carpet was dirty it looked like it hadn’t been back in from the people for those fingerprints all over the countertops that you could tell Word goodbye down there is a hand towel hanging in the bathroom that look like it been sweet white their hands on it was basically just discussing the trash was not emptied for the people for Kenny gross For the money they charge those places they should Beashea do themselves
Manager Response: First and foremost, we wanted to thank you for review about our hotel and we appreciate your candid feedback. We pride ourselves in the cleanliness of our suites we take all feedback very serious when it is brought up to our attention. Please let us know during your stay of anything you feel we fell short and we will gladly take care of the situation. We would have loved the opportunity to make it right for you. Thank you again and we hope that when you are in the Brea area again you will give us another chance at showing you our true hospitality.

Summary: During a short family visit, the wife and I decided to stay at the Chase Suits hotel in Brea, the hotel and staff are exceptional. The rooms are space and very clean, the pool was sparkling and inviting. The staff really goes out of their way to make sure you have everything you need.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Chase Suite Hotel for your short getaway, we're happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious suite and pool. we look forward to any future visits and thank you for choosing us to be your home away from home.

Summary: The Hotel was great (very clean and quiet). The rooms had plenty of space and the kitchen had everything we needed to cook. The kids enjoyed the second TV in the bedroom. As advertised, the breakfast was really good. The hotel takes all the safety precautions during this pandemic. All the staff we interacted with were always helpful and very professional. Thank you to the front desk (morning, afternoon, and overnight), the housekeepers and the ladies in the kitchen during breakfast. The kids enjoyed the stay. We will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review The Chase Suite hotel, we are glad you enjoyed our breakfast and large suites. thank you for also noticing our new safety precautions, we strive to keep our guest and staff safe. we look forward to your next visit, please give us a call if we can be of any assistance.

Summary: Checking in with a very professional front desk clerk (Anthony) was quick and easy.  He explained everything well.  Room was very clean. The hotel is close to us as we are doing a house remodel.   Would certainly recommend when we have large family gatherings.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us here at the Chase Suite Hotel Brea. We greatly appreciate your business and the wonderful review of our property and staff.  we are excited that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Chase suites has everything you could want and more. Friendly attentive staff, beautiful suites relaxing atmosphere and convenient laundry, pool and other services. Complimentary breakfast every morning with something new on the menu daily. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and will definetly stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to leave such a great review of the Chase Suite Hotel and hope we see you soon.

Summary: Staff was extremely helpful fast courteous.  Love the room however I got a full kitchen and had cooking utensils but no pans to cook with, staff didn’t tell me that I needed to request. So be sure to do that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review, we are glad you enjoyed your stay and if you ever need a place to stay you know who to call.

Summary: Everything was great, except we had a pet, and we were in a location facing the other hotel, which had a lot of activity going on back there. And because it was a pet area, the furniture seemed older Otherwise the stay was good for as long as we felt we were there. There was no room service or room service, however under the circumstances, we understood. I would recommend.
Manager Response: “Our sincerest apologies for the noise issue you encountered during your recent stay at our hotel. we hope to see you once everything goes back to normal so that you may experience all of our amenities like our buffet breakfast and daily housekeeping.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights with my kids and my Dog. The manager Jose, was very rude since the start. He just treated me like he was doing us a favor since the start!  They are not taking the thrash or doing your rooms because of COVID, so I called them so I could leave the thrash out and the cleaning lady could bring us new bags.  I had to call them 3 times because they never came until the 3rd time that I was pretty upset. We were 4 people staying at a double suite, they only left us 1 Body Shower, 1 Shampoo and 1 Lotion and when I asked for more they only wanted to give me 1 more of each tiny bottle.  Then the last thing that really bothered me, is that I asked the manager if we could please check out later or at least check out 1 hour later as my kids went back to school and
Manager Response: First and foremost we wanted to thank you for your review about our hotel. We want to apologize if you feel we fell short of your expectations during your stay with us and know all of your comments are not taken lightly and are an opportunity for us to grow from them.  We appreciate your understanding during these unprecedented times and know we are taking every precaution to ensure our hotel is a safe environment for our guests and staff alike.    We apologize if the extra hour you requested as a late check-out was not sufficient time for you, as we gladly did accommodate your request. We do require a small fee for staying past check-out time but as a goodwill gesture we did wave it for you. I do want to highlight that we sanitize all of our rooms after check-out, which requires extra time for our housekeeping department in every room and hope you understand we were not trying to be difficult.    We are not in the business of providing subpar customer service and hope this does not affect your perception of what we are all about. We have the largest suites in Brea area and offer complimentary parking, Wi-Fi and a homemade full breakfast (currently to -go) to all of our guests and hope you give us a chance once again when visiting the Brea area.

Summary: This is a great place to stay at. You dont have to see anyone if you dont want to. Everything is always clean. The staff is always on it and ready to help. The breakfast is also good. The pool is amazing. Everything here is always on point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Chase Suite Hotel, Brea.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope that you will visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: good amenities. Value for money. Clean and proper.
Summary: I'm currently checked in and after a couple of days, I like how the property is being managed.   The main lobby has some measures to protect you. There's a one way flow and that barriers are in place for the front desk. There are hand sanitizers around as well. Unfortunately, I came across a couple of guests that aren't wearing mask in separate occasions in the main building. I just went out fast.   The room I got is on the second floor. Since it's a big property, most buildings have two floors. No elevators though which might be a problem for some. Better to let them know during reservation if you want to stay on the first floor. Parking is a lot but if they're full, you might not get one near your building.  The room I got is pretty big compared to other places that would

Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay in Brea
Summary: We happened upon this hotel when we were looking for a place to stay in Brea, CA. Most rooms have a full size kitchen, including an oven and stove top. There is a door separating the sleeping area from the living room and kitchen. It's clean, quiet, and they accept pets. Good air conditioning--we come from the north, so it often feels warm in southern CA, even in the winter. There is a good size desk if you need to get your laptop. The breakfast is good too. On our last morning there, I was pleasantly surprised with eggs benedict. The egg was perfectly poached. The king size bed was comfortable. We have stayed here several times, and it is now our go-to hotel. There is no EV charger at this location.

Then I called the front desk he said something happened to their system and didn’t see someone was occupied in the room I was in and housekeeping was checking!? Then he said “sorry about that”!! If you would like to speak to me directly, I am happy to assist you.  Warm Regards,  Carol De Masi, Director of Sales

Summary: This is a very nice, dog friendly hotel. Grounds are well maintained. Rooms are spotless. Pet friendly at a cost.  Most of the front office staff are friendly while others are difficult to deal with. Food is good for breakfast, but they often run out of food.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Chase Suite Hotel Brea and for your review of our property, we always appreciate the feedback from our guests. I apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our staff, we always do our best to accommodate guest requests whenever we can, however, some requests we cannot honor.   Thank you for the compliment on our breakfast, that is an area we often shine. Since we are a rather busy property, we do need to replenish breakfast items often however, guests should not wait more than 2 minutes for fresh items to come out of our kitchen as the staff is cooking constantly throughout breakfast.  As we are a pet friendly property, it is necessary to charge for pet accommodations in order to provide additional cleaning which include the removal of allergens. Pet accommodations are offered as a convenience so that our guests have the option of keeping their four legged family close. Once our pet families check out of the hotel, we do need to ensure the next guest staying in your suite is able to enjoy the same comfort that you experienced during your stay with us.  I do hope you will visit us again the next time you are in the area, we greatly appreciate your business.  If you have question or need assistance, I am more than happy to assist you.  Warm Regards,  Carol De Masi, Director of Sales

Summary: We found this property while searching for a place away from the crowd and traffic. We were going to disney for a day and were looking for something close to restaurants. This hotel is directly across from a Whole Foods which was really convenient. The 2 bedroom suite was very clean and so much bigger than what we found closer to the coast. It's called a hotel but felt like an apartment. The breakfast was also unbelievably good. My favorite part about it was the mailman came in and gave hugs to the staff. He got a small plate to go and went his way. You can tell a lot about a business on how they treat people who aren't customers. Lots of love there.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at the Chase Suite Hotel Brea, we greatly appreciate your business and your positive review of the hotel. We do have some of the largest suites in Orange County and our two-bedroom suites feature 2 bathrooms which is uncommon in most hotels. Our freshly served buffet breakfast is one of the highlights our guests enjoy the most.  Your observation of our staff is spot on, we are a one big, happy family with the majority of our team employed here at the hotel for several years. We engage with our vendors, postal carriers and delivery service members the same as we do our guests and fellow staff members.   Please come back and see us the next time you are in the area, we would be happy to be able to accommodate you again in the future.  Warm Regards,   Carol De Masi, Director of Sales

Summary: Older property, but upgraded to modern standards. Pet fee was a little steep. Staff very friendly and helpful.  Breakfast tasty, but could have had more variety.  Parking was tight.  Good location in north Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay in Orange County
Summary: The suites are neat and well kept.  They are easily accessible and quite large and spacious.  They offer a kitchen area, a living area that has a pull out bed, and a bedroom with the bathroom attached to it.  I have used the sofa bed a number of times, and have always found it comfortable and have had a good nights sleep.  If you use both sleeping areas, there are French doors that will separate the main bedroom area from the living room, but realize that the bathroom is off the main bedroom, so you have to do some planning for its use.  The staff is very friendly and works hard to make your stay an enjoyable one.  Breakfast is fully loaded and free.  They offer a number of cereals, yogurts, fruit, eggs, meats, toast, self-made waffles, juices, and pancakes.  We have stayed at
Manager Response: none

Eggs, some type of meat hash (wish they had stuck to bacon or sausage), pancakes, make your own waffle, fruit, and yogurt. Staff was friendly and dinning area clean. Will be coming back!

Our master bedroom floor was soaking wet as it was comign through the doors in that room. When we arrive our bath tub was full of water and had a few bugs crawling around in it. I must say though, the staff was friendly and gave us a room credit on the 2nd night.

Please let me know if you plan to return to the area in the future, we would love for you to give the hotel another try.  Warm Regard,  Carol De Masi, Director of Sales

Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Chase suite hotel Brea, we greatly appreciate your business. I am sad to hear that your stay did not exceed your expectations. Our staff is dedicated to providing the best service possible for each and every one of our guests. We always try our best to accommodate our guests however, during busy seasons, it becomes less possible.   Regarding hotel room rates, we do offer a 30+ plus (monthly) rate, however, your stay dates fell short of 30 nights so unfortunately we were not able to extend you this rate. When booking under 30 nights, our rates do fluctuate and it seems that during the dates of your stay, our Best Available Rate was fluctuating between $169 and $249 nightly due to several dates where the hotel was high occupancy. The guest service agent who made your reservation secured a lower rate for you and offered that same rate nightly. The agent's offer saved you far more than you would have saved with the 10% off you would have received with the AAA or Senior rate.   I wish we could have made your stay better for you. Again, I want to thank you for your patronage and if you have any questions or concerns, I am always happy to assist you.  Warm Regards,  Carol De Masi, Director of Sales
