Summary Heading: Very good, could earn another star with some improvements
Summary: The 2-room suite was very well done with a split floorplan and a nice size kitchen. But it wasn't without its flaws. The ice maker in the fridge was missing and since there are no ice machines on property, I was hiking over to the lobby. The full size dish washer was nice to have, but it didn't work. These were minor annoyances the maintenance staff can handle but the one real drawback was the thin walls. Our first morning we were woken by a gaggle of maids having an impromptu gossip session. It was so loud we could have easily joined in if it weren't for the language barrier. The last morning our neighbor awoke us with an argument he was conducting over the phone. What made the place great was the nice layout, friendly staff, spacious rooms, great breakfast, reliable wifi and
Manager Response: So happy to hear your overall experience was great. We love hearing that. However, I want to apologize if you had an experience with the ice maker and the dishwasher. We would have loved to hear about it during your stay that way it would have given us an opportunity to bring ice to suite for you and repair the dishwasher for your use. I do want to point that if at any time there is a concern with your suite , let us know during your stay so we can look into and correct for you while you are still here.  As far as the thin walls, my sincerest apology for this as I unfortunately cannot do much about the construction of our hotel.  However, we have had a discussion with our housekeeping staff about the level of conversation during earlier hours of the day.  As they start there day at 8:30a. Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope to get the opportunity to serve you 100% to your satisfaction again in the future.

Summary: Our family was in town for our ten year reunion.  So we had seven rooms from our side of the fam.  The outside was outstanding.  The front desk workers were too.  But the rooms need a bunch of work.  Worse, they were updating them while we were there...  At 7:00 a.m.
Manager Response: First and foremost I want to thank you for your feedback as we are always very interested in assuring a wonderful guest experience. We are currently renovating all of our suites to improve our hotel as best we can and continue to work on property improvements on a daily to assure guest satisfaction. I am sure this will address any feelings you have regarding our suite conditions. Also, I do sincerely apologize for the experiences you encountered regarding the renovation but as I am aware we are not starting on any renovations on a daily until after 9 am.  I have looked into your date of stay and have confirmed with a management and the construction team of our 9 am start time but I do apologize if their was activity and if you feel the level of noise was a bit high throughout the hotel.     We value your input and I really do hope this doesn't set the tone for any future stays should you give us another chance. You can then see first hand of the beautiful renovations to our suites.  We would like the opportunity to improve your previous experience and make sure you receive the true quality service we at the Chase Suites Brea pride ourselves in providing all of our guests.  Again, thank you so much for taking the time to let us know of your experience. I really do hope you give us another opportunity to rectify your previous experience.

Summary Heading: Good but, could have been great
Summary: We booked the 2 room suite and were very happy with the room until the first morning when a toilet became stopped up. Placed a call and was told as soon as the maint man came in, the problem would be solved. Came back to the room about 4 or 5 hours later only to find problem still was unresolved and the entire suite smelled like sewage. Placed another call and 20 minutes later the problem was resolved. Had to buy some fa-breeze to tone the odor down. On our final night, we arrived back at the room only to find someone had gone into our room and placed the do not disturb placard on the door. Since we ran into other people claiming the same problem in the office asking for towels, we know that someone there did this over a maid quitting her job or other type of emergency. It would
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to leave us a review about your stay as we value all feedback from our guests. I want to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience that was caused during your stay with us. This was definitely an isolated incident and we take pride in the cleanliness and functionality of our hotel, suites and service. We have a preventative maintenance program in place at our hotel that assures the correct functionality of our suites but as things happen anywhere and any place unexpectedly we can assure you, this was an uncontrollable circumstance that I do apologize took place during your stay and I am so glad we were able to address it and correct. Please rest assured this is something that doesn't happen often.   In regards to your car damage, why did you not notify our management so we could have had an incident report and police report drawn up for you to assist with compensation for you? I looked back in our incident reports filed and did not see any report of this.  My apologies and I hope this wasn't a direct reflection of our property and hope you give us another chance when in the Brea area again.

Summary: Chase got the rooms right! We like dark rooms. They have room darkening drapes in both the sitting area and the bedroom. Only a slit of light at the opening. Pillows were either new or they got them right too. I like them plump. These were, despite being the square type. We were back in a corner where it was quiet. Little to no street noise nor from second floor. Two negatives, AC noisy above bathroom sink which was in the sleeping area. Also, parking was limited with narrow spaces and can't get close to most rooms. Definitely would stay again and recommend to others.
Manager Response: So happy hear you thought our hotel had everything to offer for you and your guests. We love hearing that. I want to apologize if you had an experience with the parking. We would have loved to hear about it during your stay that way it would have given us an opportunity to let you know that the adjacent parking lot attached to our hotel is our overflow parking with ample space, when hotel parking is tight or full and that could have made that better for you while you were her. I do want to point that if at any time there is a concern with your suite , let us know during your stay so we ca look into and correct for you while you are still here.  Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope to get the opportunity to serve you 100% to your satisfaction again in the future.

Summary: It was clean and we were very comfortable. I wish they had few more cooking pots, pans, colander etc. but we were fine. Their breakfast was great and their hospitality was much appreciated. they had a wine and appetizer hour. we don't drink, so I cannot comment on how that was, but it seemed like a nice touch. We would stay again.
Manager Response: So happy hear you thought our hotel had everything to offer for you and your guests. We love hearing that. I want to apologize if you had an experience with the pots and pans but in doing our guest surveys and studies for kitchen necessities we provide what is at most use or requested. We would have loved to hear about it during your stay that way it would have given us an opportunity to provide "extras" for you if available while you were here. Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope to get the opportunity to serve you 100% to your satisfaction again in the future.

Summary: This is a nice little property in a great location. The suites themselves are clean, comfortable, and roomy. There are tons of restaurants, shopping, and the like quite close by as well.  All in all a great stay,
Manager Response: So happy hear you thought our hotel had everything to offer for you and your guests and that our incredible location was convenient for you and your guests as well. We love hearing that. Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope to get the opportunity to serve you 100% to your satisfaction again in the future.

Summary: I wanted a suite room so that my daughter would have a comfy place to recover from surgery and I could have the amenities of an apartment to care for her while we were in L.A. The Chase Suites Hotel was the perfect fit!  Many suite hotels like Embassy Suites are large and can be noisy, but Chase was set up like little apartment buildings.  It's located near a business park, so the area was very quiet, but conveniently located a few blocks away from grocery stores and restaurants.    The rooms were spacious and well kept.  The separate bedroom made it easy for my daughter to recooperate and still allowed me space to work on my laptop at the desk in the sitting room.  The fridge, microwave and sink made it easy to heat/keep food and drinks.  My only small complaint would be that
Manager Response: So happy hear you thought our hotel had everything to offer for you and your daughter especially during such a sensitive reason for your stay.  We love hearing that we have met all guests needs. We hope she has since recovered nicely and hope we contributed to that. I want to apologize if you had an experience with the air conditioning however the design of our hotel and suites and ac's in front of each individual suite,  at times with a few ac's running together the level of noise may seem a bit loud to some. We would have loved to hear about it during your stay that way it would have given us an opportunity to possibly move you to another suite or area. Thank you very much for staying with us and we hope to get the opportunity to serve you 100% to your satisfaction again in the future.

Summary: My husband and I needed a pet friendly place to stay while our house was being fumigated. Check in was easy,room was newly redone so all was going good until we had night visitors and I don't mean our friends we originally invited over for a visit. We had very large brown roaches crawling around the room. The manager did have a staff member come kill the buggers but honestly I was kinda freaking out. We were offered a new pet friendly room but moving our cat is a major undertaking and felt the roaches weren't probably just in our room so we hung in there. Manager didn't seem to concerned with the situation as I sure they might of heard this complaint before. Honestly the place is not a bad place but maybe a fumigation of its own is in order.
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to leave us a review about your stay. I want to apologize for any inconvenience that was caused during your short stay with us. As our Front Office Manager mentioned during your stay this was definitely an isolated incident and we take pride in the cleanliness of our hotel. We have very reputable pest control company that handles our hotel so please rest assured this is something that doesn't happen. Our front office manager mentioned you were here because your house was getting fumigated so I understand how this could have been an annoyance to you. We hope this wasn't a direct reflection of our property and hope you give us another chance when in the Brea area again.

Summary Heading: Good Suite Hotel, Good Breakfast, Slightly Pricy
Summary: Stayed here for couple of nights recently as we were going thru home remodeling.  I wanted a 2-double bed suite but those were sold out so we had a king suite but luckily the sofa was a pull-out bed.  Room was good size, kitchenette was good size.  Its certainly not new but we didn't have problem with it.  Our room seem at least clean.  Fridge was big and cold, utensils plenty (again just 2 days so no problem there).  No problem with parking.  Another way to put it, inside of the room looks better than the exterior paint.   Breakfast was good, scramble eggs, sausage or bacon, along with other usuals (cereal, bread...etc).  I thought I'd mention meat because some hotels actually don't have meat for breakfast.  I thought orange juice was pretty good.   They have social hours
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay :) We love to hear when our guests have experienced all of our amenities that we have to offer. We pride ourselves in our breakfast and our over-sized suites. Thank you for noticing we have many shops that our guests can enjoy as well as a recent addition to our neighborhood that includes a Whole Foods and many other restaurants and shops that are walking distance from our hotel. Thank you again and we hope to serve you again really soon!

Summary: I'm not sure why this place has a high rating. My original room 326 was not acceptable. Bathroom was filthy; Tub was disgusting; Desk was made of matchsticks- unable to work on it; small dinged up kitchenette when my booking said full kitchen; carpet was not new despite earlier comments stating all rooms had new carpet; Huge gaps around the doors- which are exterior and not very safe. I finally did get a new room which was cosmetically much nicer- but one of the windows wouldn't close all the way and actually could be pushed out of the frame- so again- not a safe environment. The manager was nice but refused to give me our company rate because I booked through my company's travel agency....HELLO..... they were the ones who recommended this place as a preferred hotel!!!! Made no
Manager Response: First and foremost I want to apologize again for the experiences you encountered. We did our very best to accommodate all of your requests during your stay. Your reservation did come in as a kitchenette suite through your travel agency and we went ahead switched you to a full kitchen despite the room type that was indicated in our system. I can assure you our rooms are very safe and most hotels do have windows that can be pushed out for fire safety reason from the inside only, this is a standard. I can assure you all of our rooms do have new carpet as of last year. We did make you aware that unfortunately the rate could not be changed due to the way your travel agency made the reservation otherwise we would have gladly made the reservation with your company's rate like we normally do for all of the employees of your company.  We value your input and I really do hope this doesn't set the tone for any future stays should you give us another chance, as this one was a short one night stay and it definitely doesn't reflect what we are all about even though we really did try to our very, very, very best to accommodate your needs. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know again of your experience, as while you were here we could not resolve the issues up to your standards. I really do hope you give us another chance and we can attempt to rectify your previous experience.

Summary Heading: Staycation fun with full breakfast? Health department?
Summary: One of the most comfortable beds I have slept on, key to any good night's rest. The manager on duty was congenial and check-in was not labored or induced hyperventilation or diaphoresis. Suite environment with a full kitchen was appreciated. Up with the sun so I missed the breakfast yet will return to explore this further. Delightful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much! Yes you are right, we do have the most comfortable beds, so comfortable that people can even get the number to our supplier and buy their own! Next time do make sure you try our breakfast, we make everything from scratch and it's a hot American breakfast buffet.with an array of choices. Thank you again for your kind review and hopefully we see you again in the near future.

Summary: We have stayed here when we visit my ... for 15 years. Love having the space and the kitchen. We bring our dog and there is grass around the property. Staff has always been responsive and the breakfast staff is awesome. Breakfast is great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the last 15 years! We love having you as guests every time. We appreciate the nice comments and happy to hear we continue to meet and exceed your expectations as that is our number one goal. See you soon!

Summary: Great place to stay...in town for business and was very professional and even called me my first night to make sure the room was suitable. Nice breakfast was offered.  Noise level was quiet even though it was full.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We want to thank you for choosing us during your recent visit to the Brea area and I'm very happy to hear that you had a great stay and enjoyed our amenities and our awesome breakfast. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: Best bed! The bed was just so good, wanted to take it home with me!  Great breakfast! Great selection of hot and cold foods! Great friendly staff! The suite with king bed was roomy and they had fridge and microwave oven and even toaster! Excellent location! Reasonable rates. The only negatives were the bathtub was old and painted over and some paint was coming off. Parking area was a little small and had to park a little ways away when we came late.
Manager Response: Awesome! We are ecstatic to hear you had such a great experience! Thank you for taking advantage of everything we have to offer and letting us know, we truly appreciate guest such as yourself and hope to see you in the near future when in the Brea area once again.

Summary: We really liked this hotel, and the price was good also. Getting a good night sleep is ridiculously important, and seems difficult to do these days (between careless guests and poorly designed hotels). This place is well designed for privacy and comfort, and quiet. Had a good breakfast also. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience with our hotel. I am so happy to hear you had a great night sleep as that is one of goals! Our mattresses are Simmons pillow tops and they are the MOST comfortable beds. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast as well, as we make everything from scratch every day! Thank you again and see you again really soon.

Summary: Even though we knew there were a lot of people staying at the hotel when we were there, our room was very quiet, you couldn't hear many sounds from other rooms. The pool and hot tub were nice. We enjoyed the breakfast as well. The staff made our stay enjoyable, and quickly responded to our requests. We will come here again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed everything we have to offer. Our pool and hot tub are very relaxing especially during California's summer days. Our breakfast is made from scratch every day so that's our little secret ;-)  Thank you again for your kind words our staff is very aware of all our reviews and take pride in giving our guests the best service around. We hope to see you very soon when visiting the Brea area again!

Summary: The facilities are excellent for our group (high school band).  The pool is not large, but we run 'em ragged during the daytime so they are pooped and happy to stay in their "fancy" rooms.  The real slam dunk is the staff though.  The breakfasts were amazing, fresh, and real food.  No egg mix, no microwave sausage.  All done in a skillet or pan and all awesome (pancakes were awesome, but the eggs rocked!)
Manager Response: LOVE IT! Thank you so much! We loved having your group and are so happy they enjoyed their stay. Yes you are right, our breakfast is the best in town and we take pride in making it from scratch every day. Thank you again for taking the time and leaving us a review about your experience and we hope to see you again next year!

Summary: Decent place. Good bed. Crisp sheets. Soft towels. Very clean. Nice staff. Very good, complimentary real breakfast and coffee. Fresh fruit, eggs, waffles, sausage. They also have a little happy hour. Office park setting near Suzuki Motor Co. My only complaint was the loud on and off a/c. Room had a frig, micro and small coffee maker. Would recommend. Nice little surprise. We stayed in Brea overnight to attend our granddaughters kindergarten graduation and avoid a long morning, cross county, drive in yucky traffic
Manager Response: Thank you! I'm so glad you were able enjoy our delicious breakfast! I do want to highlight that we make everything from scratch and do everything possible to serve our guests with the best quality. We are always looking for ways to be different than other hotels. Thank you again for your kind review and hope to see you again when you come back and visit your grandkids!

Summary: This location is perfect for visiting family in Brea. We have 2 small children and were really excited to have room with a living area and kitchen, not to mention a pool. We love that you can park right in front of your room so there is no luggage hauling or elevator hassle. The only problem was that the carpet is FILTHY. Within 10 minutes of taking a bath and staying INSIDE the hotel room, both feet of my children looked like they'd run around a freshly paved parking lot. And this was not exclusive to the kids either, it was also the case with my husband and I. We will not stay there again due to this problem. We are very disappointed because everything else made it the perfect place to stay.
Manager Response: So happy hear you thought our hotel had everything to offer for you and your family. We love hearing that. I want to apologize if you had an experience with the carpet in your room. We would have loved to hear about it during your stay that way it would have given us an opportunity to make it better for you while you were her.         I do want to point out that our hotel has brand new carpets throughout all rooms and this may have been an isolated incident as we take pride in the cleanliness of our rooms and it is the first I hear about a situation such as this. Needless to say I hope this doesn't set the tone for the next time you are in the Brea area and hope you would choose us again so we can have the opportunity to serve you 100% to your satisfaction.

Summary: The place is very comfortable, the staff are great, as you'd expect of a Californian hotel, breakfast was everything you need. The pool was basic but clean and great to sit next to while eating breakfast and starting the day. Only slight issue was the painfully slow internet speed but that's not such a big problem, right?
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at CSH-B while I was visiting friends and business associates in the Long Beach area.  The hotel was conveniently located to major highways, but silent at the same time.  I think the only noise I heard was my own children.  The staff was responsive and helpful for the minor calamities that I caused, and the breakfast was tasty.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Great to hear you had a wonderful stay and thank you for choosing us during your visit to Brea. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: The entire stay was lovely. Our housekeeping person was fast and efficient. The room was spotless every day of our five day stay. The room was fine except for a bump in the carpet between the bedroom and the living room. I was concerned that I might trip over it and I believe it should be fixed. Additionally there was a sign over the kitchen sink indicating that there was no disposal in the sink. There was a working disposal and I think that it may be a problem should one turn on the switch while another person could have their hand in the disposal. The room number is 502.
Manager Response: So happy to hear you had a wonderful stay with us! We take pride in the cleanliness of our rooms and are happy to hear you were satisfied. Thank you for all of your input as we take everything very serious and grow from advice such as yours. We hope to see you again when in the Brea area once again!

Summary: We stayed here for one night. My husband had work nearby and this was a really nice large suite with a small kitchenette. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The breakfast was definitely way better than most hotel breakfasts. I couldn't give the place a five because it could use some updating, for example the bathtub was less than inviting and the tiles on the bathroom floor were loose.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We appreciate your review because without them we cannot continue to grow. SO happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast, we take pride in making our eggs and other items from scratch. I wanted you know that we will be undergoing renovation during the 4th quarter of this year (our summer months are very busy and don't allow us to do it sooner.) Hopefully you will visit us then and love changes we will make to our bathrooms specifically. Thank you again for choosing the Chase Suite Hotel in Brea and hope to see you in the near future during your next visit.

Summary: The service was good. The cleaning lady would do a good job one day and bad another. The rooms are spacious. The front desk workers want you to have a nice time. We went with a school group of about 50 and they treated us like everyone else.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for visiting us and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We loved having you and loved listening to your group sing every morning you were here. Thank you again and hope to see your school again next year!

Summary: I only gave this four stars because five stars would seem like an inside review and I wanted you to take this seriously.  My wife and I stayed here two nights ago and our experience was terrific.  They gave us the quietest room, which we had asked for but is sometimes just a toss-up.  The room was quiet, clean and very pleasant.  I must say, that the best part of staying here was the breakfast.  Wow!  I have stayed at many hotels in this price range over many years.  You usually get the standard food.  Pre-made egg turnovers, bad sausage, okay orange juice, so-so coffee and no service.  This usually makes you feel that they want you to eat, (because that's what they advertised to get you in the door), and then get the hell out.  And, many times, you have to pay extra for this
Manager Response: Wow thank you!! I loved reading your review :-) It is reviews such as these that make my heart happy knowing we are doing everything right.  We love serving our guests and we love to make sure they have the best experience possible every time. I am glad to hear yours was and that is what we strive for every day. Thank you so much again and hope to see you in the near future if you are ever in the Brea once again!

Summary: This was our second stay at Chase Suites.  Our room this time was even better than the first.  We had a full blown kitchen with stove top, microwave and a full refrigerator.  There is plenty of table and counter space.  All you need as far as utilities for eating and making food is there.  The room was spacious with a couch in a different room than the California king sized bed.  The air conditioner worked really well and was quiet.  The hot water in the shower came on quickly and the pressure was good.  As far as the breakfast? during the week there seemed to be a bigger selection? than on the weekend?  The breakfast choice includes: make your own waffles, fruits, scrambled eggs, sausages, bacon, cereals along with English muffins and bagels. The parking lot gets crowded so its
Manager Response: THANK YOU! We love to hear when our guests love us! Our #1 goal is to exceed our guests expectations every time.  I love that you were able to enjoy our delicious homemade breakfast and loved everything your full kitchen suite had to offer :-) Thank you again and hope to see you soon!

Summary: The rooms here are large and well-maintained.  The pool area, while small, is clean and has plenty of seating and towels.  The breakfast was nice (no powdered eggs), fresh fruit and decent coffee.  The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much! SO happy you enjoyed your stay and thank you for taking the time to let us know. We hope you come and visit soon when in the Brea area again!

Summary Heading: Great for families, but I needed to sleep and did not get it
Summary: I was placed in a great suite, but a family was placed above me with little ones that constantly jumped on the floor (my ceiling), so I could not get any sleep or rest.  The children were so loud and would keep me up when I tried to take a nap after driving 2+ hours straight to get to the hotel, and early in the morning when I was trying to sleep in after getting back very late from a wedding nearby (the reason I was at the hotel in the first place).  I spoke with the Front Desk on multiple occasions about the noise, and while they did listen, they did not do anything to correct except offer me a worse room to stay in.
Manager Response: First and foremost I want to apologize for your experience with our hotel. When situations like this arise (which don't happen too often) we do contact guests on numerous occasions to get the children to quiet down and hope the guest is conscious of other guests. I hope this wasn't a direct reflection what our hotel is truly about and hope you give us another chance when you are in the area again. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and I am glad to hear you thought your suite was great, aside from the noise issues from the guest above you. Thank you again.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Chase, as we always do, and found our room much improved since our last visit. The maid service as excellent, the room spotless, and as always, the front desk folks, especially Jose, were most accommodating. We arrived early from a long drive and were just pooped out. He took care of us with no hesitation. The hospitality area is still one of the most generous of any motor hotel we stayed in. Clean, good unpretentious  food and beverage.
Manager Response: Thank you! I'm happy to hear you liked the improvements we have made to our rooms. I'm also happy to hear that Jose was able to take care of you as he is excellent at taking care of our guests. We hope to see you again very soon! :-)

Summary: I give this property a 4 star rating due to its location close to our family when we visit Orange County and the fact that it is a very pet friendly facility.  The rooms are spacious, and the morning breakfast is superior to most of these types of facilities with hot items like scrambled eggs, bacon and corned beef hash.  There are many restaurants and services close by, and freeway access is within a couple of miles.  We stay here each time we visit North Orange County.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you were able to take advantage of all of our amenities we have to offer.  We appreciate you as a guest and love hearing when our guests have been well served as that is our #1 goal. Thank you and hope to see you again during your next visit to the Brea area.

Summary: great base for southern cal vacation....staff were great, breakfast was great too although bacon should be thicker, will use again if we are down there in future.....pool, hot tub, washer dryer can bring less clothes.....etc
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are so happy to hear your stay was outstanding that is exactly what we love to hear.  Thank you again and hope to see you again on our next visit to the Brea area.

Summary: Upon walking in the door we were immediately greeted with a big smile by the front desk gentleman.  He was very friendly and helpful.  After driving for over 5 hours we arrived early and our room was not ready.  No problem, he readily allowed us to store our 2 suitcases in the room behind the desk until we were able to check in late in the evening after attending our event.  Check in was very quick.  We stayed only one night and our mini-suite was perfect for us.  It contained a small frig, microwave, and coffee maker.  The bed was very comfy as were the down pillows.  The buffet breakfast was very good with plenty of choices, hot items were potatoes, pancakes, and scrambled eggs with ham chunks.  Free Wi-Fi was very easy to access.  As a former Brea resident, we have used this
Manager Response: Awesome to hear! Jose does have a great smile :)  Happy to hear you had a fantastic stay and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: This location is excellent. Check in was fast and the staff were very friendly. The property is well maintained and clean. Our room was very nice with lots of upgrades. The kitchen was fully stocked and the location is perfect. Near shopping and the hwy but room was very quiet. They are also pet friendly, which is a plus. The morning breakfast was delicious and there is an attendant. When we travel to the area again we will surely stay at chase suites. Lots of value for the price.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear you had a fantastic time! We love hearing when our guests take advantage of all of our amenities.....THANK YOU! We can't wait to have you back when you return to the Brea area.

Summary: I booked a two bedroom suite for me and my in-laws for a two night stay.  Check-in was great...the front desk staff were very friendly and helpful.  This is a "Motel" type setup, which means that the doors are all outside.  Parking was good, we didn't have a problem finding any, even after arriving later in the evening.  Once we found the room (the numbering system was confusing at first, the even number rooms were on one side of the building, odd on the other), we checked it out and found a couple of issues.  One was in the kitchen area there's an area that had previous been repaired and the linoleum had come up.  We called the next day about it and they came right over and repaired it.  Also my in-laws said there what may have been poo on the wall, but the small amount of it
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us some feedback in regards to your stay! I'm glad to hear we were able to take care of anything you felt we fell short on during your stay, and yes, things do happen and all we ask is an opportunity to rectify them. I am so happy to hear you loved our breakfast and our amenities and hopefully we will see you again in the near future in your travels to the Brea area.

Summary: The staff were friendly and welcoming, check-in was quick and easy, the breakfast was good and different each day.  Our room was clean and spacious room.  We had an issue with the tv but they resolved it right away.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know you had a great stay! We strive for your ultimate satisfaction every time. I'm happy to hear you got to enjoy our delicious breakfast and loved how spacious our suites were.... just what we like to hear! Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review and hope to see you very soon on your next visit to the Brea area.

Summary: Chase was on the recommended list of places to stay for a conference. We found the staff friendly and helpful. They offer a very nice breakfast. Also offered is a happy hour which our schedule did not permit attending. I would not usually comment on the towels except they were the softest I've ever encountered, at home or traveling.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! Very happy to hear you had such a great stay as your satisfaction is our #1 goal.  We hope to see you again during your next visit to the Brea area whether it is for business or pleasure!

Summary: Room was very spacious. There were granite counter tops in the kitchen. All their rooms are suites and have 2 large rooms. The bed was very comfortable. The included breakfast was a full buffet & changed over the 2 mornings I ate. I'd go back again for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us review about your stay! So happy to hear you had a great stay and took advantage of everything we have to offer. We hope to see you very soon during your next visit to the Brea area!

Summary: We had a great experience at this hotel. Our family stayed two nights here. The location was only a twenty minute drive to Knott's Berry Farm. They had an awesome breakfast buffet. It was a small dinning room, but it was never too crowded. Our rooms were amazing! We had a suite with a full kitchen, two separate bedrooms and bathrooms (one with a king, the other with a full) and the family room had a pull out bed. It was quiet and pleasant. The employees were helpful and welcoming. Great stay! We would highly recommend this hotel. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: It's a great feeling every time we hear our guests have a great stay and it never gets old to us! Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are so happy you got to enjoy our awesome breakfast buffet and ecstatic to hear you loved our rooms!  We will see you again when in the area and will welcome you back with open arms.

Summary: This hotel was a very pleasant surprise.  The bed was good.  The rooms were very large.  There were two separate rooms. There was a full kitchen and living room.  Then there was a bedroom.  This hotel was very quiet too.  All this led to a great stay in Brea!
Manager Response: Thank you! So happy to hear your had a fabulous stay.  We do consider ourselves Brea's hidden gem and love when guests have a chance to see what we are all about.  We hope to see you again very soon when visiting the Brea area.

Summary: The hotel was fine in every way EXCEPT the nasty bathroom. The tub/shower was tile and grout, and the grout was black with mildew. The tub faucet was loose, and when showering, half the water came out of the tub faucet instead of the shower head. The tub didn't drain properly, so I showered in 4 inches of water. I was so disgusted that I couldn't bring myself to use the shower the second day I was there. Noise from upstairs unit was very loud. Finally, there was a desk chair but no desk in the room! It made it hard to do work on my computer.  I would not stay at this hotel again unless there are major improvements. (Room 301)
Manager Response: First and foremost I wanted to thank you for your candid review and letting us know how your stay was with us. I am glad to hear your overall stay was a good one and appreciate you pointing out items in your room.  Without reviews such as yours we cannot continue to improve our facilities and do take everything very seriously.  We are actually in the middle of a renovation and making positive changes every month.  Thank you again and hope your past stay wasn't a direct reflection of you we truly are.

Summary: This was a great stay for the family. Very  accessible from the road, and not far from shopping. We  had a 2 room suite, and having the second bathroom  made it very nice. Rooms were very  spacious. So not stepping over each other. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for letting us know about your stay!  We are so happy to hear it was a great one!  We hope to see you again when you come back to the Brea area.

Summary: Great location  Room in need of major repairs Both shower and tubs for the adjoining rooms have missing grout and let water run into the walls poor silicone repair on partial wall tile which in turn let's water through the walls and out under the carpet in next room and I am positive black mold in walls. Wall paper peeling up in all the rooms ,front door very hard to latch kids and wife could not lock it I had to pull hard to turn the latch. Found the shower water leaking through the wall when I went to shave and my feet and socks got soaked (gross). Refrigerator was so noisy it was hard to sleep. They had an extra trash can under the sink in the kitchen to catch the leaking water from the sink plumbing. Wrong toilet seat on toilet in one room won't stay up unless you hold it
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay.  It is reviews such as yours that allow us to continue improving our hotel.  As you mentioned, you didn't get a chance to let us know about your concerns while you were here, I wish you would have, so you could have given us the opportunity to make it right while you were here.  We aren't in the business of not providing you with the best accommodations as well as the best service and when we don't know about situations, we aren't able to rectify any issues.  With that said, I hope your this stay isn't a direct reflection of what we are about and hope you visit us again soon when in the Brea area!

Summary: Good size suites, a bit dated but clean and quiet.  Our room did have an overwhelming scent of air freshener - not sure what that was all about. The clerk almost double billed us for our prepaid stay. Honest mistake. Morning coffee was absolutely horrible but there is a Starbucks next door. Overall worth the money and fairly comfortable.
Manager Response: First and foremost we want to thank you for taking the time leave us a candid review. We appreciate feedback such as yours as we cannot continue to grow from our guests comments.  We always get compliments about our wonderful breakfast but do realize everyone's palate is different and appreciate when we hear otherwise so we can improve.  We thank you again and hope to see you again when in the Brea area.

Summary: I have stayed at Chase Suites in Brea multiple times in 2016. The main reason for the first time was its proximity to my office. I realized that the room is spacious and well maintained, the breakfast is filling and the evening socials (Mon-Thur) are a bonus and this truly a value for money option. Only disadvantage is that their shuttle timings don't work for me and they don't have their own rewards program or tie up with any major airlines.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us continually throughout 2016! We love to hear why you stay with us as what you mention is what we take pride in; our spacious rooms and our breakfast and hospitality hour (along with our service to meet your needs:-))     Thank you for letting us know about our shuttle times we are always looking at ways to improve our hotel.  You are correct, since we are an independently family owned hotel, we do not have the capability to offer a rewards program due to our size.  We hope we make up for it in what I mentioned before, our spacious suites, delicious food and great service and that continue to stay with us throughout this coming 2017.

Summary: Very Clean, Very Friendly!!!!. Front Desk very welcoming, Full Kitchen very user friendly... Felt like home away. Only down side.. parking was a little tight.. Very Quiet even though on a busy street..
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review! We are thrilled to hear you had an excellent stay. Our number one goal is make sure your stay is excellent and we are so glad to hear it was!

Summary: This is a roomy suite with very comfortable bed! There is a small fridge and microwave in the room I stayed and a dining room with dishes in the cupboard. I would come back to this hotel for the next meeting.  The only negative to this hotel was the bathtub had a small chip that rusted next to the drain which lowered the appearance slightly to this hotel. The parking lot was freshly black coated.
Manager Response: First and foremost thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us.  We strive to provide excellent service and amenities all around and I am so happy to hear you had a successful stay.  I do want to let you know we have made changes to our suites and the next thing on our list is a full remodel of our bathrooms which we are so ecstatic to do.  With that said, I urge you to visit us again so you can see the new room amenities and late first quarter 2017 our bathrooms which will be remodeled as well.  Thank you again!

Summary: I got in very late because of flight delays, but was promptly checked in by a very friendly front desk clerk.  This is an older property.  It has very large rooms with a separate bedroom.  The rooms were clean and the bed very comfortable.  The parking was quite far away from the suite I was assigned, and the property has outside access with stairs to the second floor.  The breakfast provided was fine.  I did not use the Internet to any extent, so I cannot rate that aspect of this hotel.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review, we truly appreciate your comments. I'm so glad to hear your stay was an enjoyable one.  I wanted to let you know that we are making many improvements to the property and hope next time you visit you will be pleasantly surprised.

Summary: Our suite was spacious and clean. We shared the suite and plenty of room. large fridge, micro wave and dishwasher. Staff friendly and courteous. Nice size pool.Complimentary breakfasts include nicely scrambled eggs with alternating waffles/pancakes with bacon/sausage. Cereal, toast, muffins and bagels. Juices and coffee. Happy hour social Monday thru Thursday.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review!  We are so happy to hear your stay was an enjoyable one. It looks like you got to enjoy all of our amenities we have to offer especially our delicious made from scratch breakfast! Thank you again and hope to see you soon on your next visit to the Brea area.

Summary: My  wife and I have stayed here, exclusively, for years now, and short of the place turning into a resident hotel, will continue for time to come. It's old, and dated, but all the staff work hard to keep things in operation. Being in the hotel industry for years I can spot  positives and negatives in the operation. The hotel is run by bilingual Hispanics, who really work hard to make your stay pleasant. The Front Desk are top notch. The Hospitality staff work hard to serve the guests an accommodating breakfast and evening snack, and housekeeping, by and large, keep the rooms as comfortable as possible. That being said, the attention to detail is lacking, but not a deal breaker. Will I stay here again? Absolutely.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and we truly appreciate your candid remarks. I do want to let you know that we are making extensive improvements to our hotel and hope we will be your choice next time you are in the Brea area

Summary Heading: Clean, well laid-out suites in away from the Disneyland commotion
Summary: We have a house in Fullerton and have used the Chase Suites to accomodate guests because it is near high quality retail (Brea Mall and Whole Foods...), restaurants and freeways without having to contend with the continuous buzz associated with the Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm locations. This visit we stayed there because our house was undergoing renovation. The staff are friendly and quick to respond to any issues, the rooms are comfortable, roomy and appointed with necessary ammenities. One of the bedrooms in our two bedroom suite that we stayed in could have been quieter, but the other was fine. Other than some chipping of the finish on the tub in one bathroom the rooms were clean and well maintained. The price is better than other comparable units in the region. We will
Manager Response: Thank you! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay.  It is our goal to make your stay an enjoyable one and it was pleasure to have you stay with us during your renovation.  We truly value you as our guest and hope to see you or any of your family visiting from out of town in the near future.

Summary: The room was very big, lot of room, actually two rooms to spread out and relax. Has a fridge, large couch and comfy bed. The bathroom was alittle dated and in need of an upgrade, paint and slight repairs.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let give us feedback about your stay, we truly appreciate them, without them we cannot continue to strive to be better.  I do want to let you know we are making extensive renovations to our suites and hope you come visit us soon so you can enjoy them.

Summary: Rooms are very clean and spacious.  The location is perfect, close to my business and many restaurants.  Excellent pool.  Breakfast served daily. There are also nightly snacks/drinks served as well.  Overall, I will gladly come here again.
Manager Response: Thank you! We are so happy to hear your stay was a great one, that is our number one goal!  We truly appreciate you and hope to see you again during your next visit to Brea!

Summary Heading: Perfect environment for working on my book!
Summary: The suite was like a pleasant apartment with everything I needed! I was comfortable. The office personnel were kind and responsive to any needs I had. The evening Happy Hours were tasty.Great experience all around.
Manager Response: We are so delighted to hear your stay was an enjoyable one. Thank you for taking the time to let us know!  We hope to see you again during your next visit to Brea.

Summary Heading: A very good choice if you're staying in Brea
Summary: We chose the Chase because of its location, close to people we were visiting. It is also across from a new shopping strip, with decent restaurants.  The staff were friendly and reliable. The room, a suite with kitchenette, was a good size. Not an elegant decor, but fitting for the price.   The bed and pillows were really comfortable...perfect for a good night sleep. The bathroom was rather outdated, but the shower water-pressure was great.   Not an ideal vacation destination, but definitely a good choice if you need be in the area or are just passing through.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay! We are happy to hear you had a great experience.  I do want to let you know we are in the middle of upgrading our suites and hope next time you come visit us you will be able to enjoy our changes!  Thank you again!

Summary: We have stayed here plenty of times with family and friends - great layout of the property - nice pool area and good breakfast!  Rooms have full kitchens! Bathrooms are small but it works!  Great location and staff! New big  whole foods at the corner and Starbucks
Manager Response: We LOVE to hear when our guests had a great stay, that is something we strive for everyday! We hope you come back and visit us soon, we have made changes to our suites!

Summary Heading: My choice for staying when I have to work in the area
Summary: I work in Brea and stay at this hotel 2-3 nights per week on my own dime. The hotel is simple but nice and beats other properties that are more expensive and have a brand behind them. The 1-bedroom apartment rooms are pretty fair value, and large though the bathrooms are a bit small considering the sizes of the living room, kitchen and bedroom. The area is safe and you can now walk to a nice new complex with restaurants, outdoor sitting and a Whole Foods that can cover all your basic needs. Though I have not done many of their happy hours, they always have something going on and I did enjoy a ‘dinner’ our of the heavy snacks and meatballs they were serving one of the days. Breakfast is okay but has a late start (6:30 AM) for folks like me that start calls and work at 6:30 or 7
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know about you stay with us, we truly value all of our guests and appreciate it every time a guest leaves us comments because that helps us grow. I wanted to let you know we are making improvements to our property and hope you will visit us again so you can enjoy them.  Thank you again!

Summary: We travel to Anaheim frequently for family gatheringings but have never stayed here before. The area hotels were all full or very over priced due to a youth traveling sport championship, this one also. Knowing this we were expecting it to be noisey but found ourselves wondering where all the kids were it was so quiet. We arrived early & were greeted nicely & they were able to chceck us in to our suite right away. There are several buildings to this Inn ours was not in the main building which wwe actually prefer. Our room was nice & cool, as it was over 100 it was much appreciated. The bedroom was quite room & clean. The bath was also quite comfortable. The living area ws laid out perfect for entertaining a few quest. The full kitchen was a nice touch. We enjoyed having a full
Manager Response: So great to hear you had such an enjoyable stay with us! I wanted to let you know that we are making improvements to our hotel and we hope you come visit us soon so you can enjoy them.  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us, your comments are greatly appreciated.

Summary: My room is more than I expected, having been to nearby Rancho Coucamunga earlier in the year, I anticipated a similar, small room with bedroom and bathroom-NOT SO HERE! You walk into a nice little living room, with TV, a small but complete kitchen should you desire to cook during your stay (complete with full size fridge/freezer.) The bedroom can be closed off from the other 1/2 of the suite. Area surrounding the grounds was nice. A Plaza within 1/10 mile had several eateries to suite different tastes.Sidewalks are spacious and fairly clean-nice for a morning walk around town.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are so glad to hear you loved our spacious suites and enjoyed everything we had to offer.  We hope to become your choice every time you are visiting the Brea area!

Summary: Our Hawaii travel baseball team has stayed at the Chase Suites in Brea for the past 4 years and we have NEVER been disappointed. Krsytal Safar, Hector Mejia, Jose and ALL of the staff members are VERY accommodating, easy to work with and will go above-and-beyond to ensure that our experience in Southern California is memorable.   The suites are clean, VERY affordable and feels like our home away from Hawaii. Mahalo Krystal, Hector, Jose and staff of Chase Suites Brea for another great stay!
Manager Response: We LOVE Hawaii!  We love having you every year and we thank you for our wonderful relationship.  Can wait to see you all again very soon!

Summary: We recently had to endure a little home improvement, so it was a great time to decamp to Chase Suites in Brea again. Of course, there was a clean, cool, spacious suite with a kitchen. Of course, there was breakfast. Of course, there was free wifi. Of course there was happy hour each evening, near the sparkling pool. We already knew that. A new welcome improvement is the Whole Foods Market plaza that just opened across the street, full of restaurants and shops. If you are planning a visit to Orange County, Chase Suites is the place for you.
Manager Response: Thank you!!! We love your comments and love that you loved us! It was our pleasure to have you as our guest and appreciate all the nice comments. :-) Yes the Whole Foods shopping center was heaven sent, making it so much easier for our guests to get something to eat or do some shopping! We hope you come visit us again! (Maybe on a nice little getaway. :-) )

Summary: We had a King Suite the room was very clean, lots of space, close to all shopping, close to Disneyland less than 11 miles. The staff was very nice and helpful. Housekeeping were very friendly and accommodating. The pool was nice, kids loved it.
Manager Response: Great to hear you an enjoyable stay! We love to hear when our guests love our spacious suites.  I hope you got a chance to enjoy our delicious breakfast and so happy to hear your kids loved our pool! We hope to see you again next time you are in the Brea area!

Summary: This is an older hotel that is being upgraded.  Our room smelled musty, but we loved the setting.  The flowers around the buildings were beautiful and the heated pool was terrific.  We loved the fact that the guest laundry was by the pool.  You can wash clothes and watch the kids at the same time.  As far as the room went, there was plenty of space with the exception of the bathroom.  It was tiny and the tub was rusty and in bad shape.  Hopefully that will be one thing that will be upgraded.  The breakfast was very good and plentiful.  The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: We love hear when guests such as yourself had a great stay! I do want to inform you we are making improvements to our property and hopefully next time you stay with us you will be able to experience them.  Thank you for your kind words and hope to see you again!

Summary: The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The Social food and drink are nice. I haven't had a chance to try the breakfast as I leave for work before it is served.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel and love to hear your stay was an enjoyable one. I hope you tried our breakfast by now, because I must say it is excellent! We made everything in house and take pride in everything we put out for our guests.  Thank you again and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: This is an older two story (multiple buildings with stairs), mid-century motel-like hotel.  It had exterior room entrances, dated plumbing fixtures, low counter heights, etc.  But, other than some painted over wall paper which was starting to curl and separate, the general facility was attractive and appears to have been well maintained.  The grounds, clubhouse, and individual rooms were presentable, clean, and comfortable.  The staff was gracious and responsive.  The "free" breakfast was very good.  However, the parking was inadequate.  Not enough spaces for a full house, which we apparently experienced.  We had to park in an adjacent commercial building's lot.  The inconvenience was minor, but present.     Note that the hotel has a number of "A" rooms.  These rooms are less
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience at our hotel and appreciate your candid remarks.  Yes you are correct, back when you stayed with us, we did have A rooms which were a good choice for price conscious travelers who were not looking for a full suite.  Since your stay we have converted those to become our 2 bedroom Suites, which I think you will find enjoyable and super spacious and measuring at 790sq ft.  We hope we become your choice next time you are in the area and you enjoy one of our One Bedroom or 2 Bedroom Suites.

Summary: Very complete package, large clean, quiet room with full kitchen and comfortable bed.  Staff most helpful in meeting unusual needs for a family member and beyond question the best and only place have experienced a true breakfast with fresh flavorful food each day as part of the package.  Such value and complete package have never experienced at any other location.  Thank you to all!
Manager Response: Thank you! We love that you loved our amenities and our breakfast! It is delicious isn't it? We hope to see you again in the near future, it was a pleasure to have you as our guest.

Summary Heading: A great stay at Chase Suites.
Summary: The suites are huge, a large living area with couch, TV, coffee table.  A well equipped kitchen and breakfast bar. Large Kingsize bed, very comfortable indeed.  The rooms were excellent, comfortable and clean.  A really nice complimentary breakfast and helpful and friendly staff means that this is my place for staying in Northern Orange County from now on.  Its right off of Imperial Hwy close to Valencia so an easy location to find too.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you had a great stay! We strive every day to make all of our guests stay an excellent one and love to hear when we have accomplished our goal.  We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary: I'm traveling with my parents and son. This was a good place for us to stay. It had a pool and the laundry facility that were together so I could do laundry and watch my son swim. The room was good but the bathtub had some rust and needs to be updated. It had a full size fridge and that would have been nice if we were staying longer. Over all if was worth the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel.  I want to let you know we are making improvements to our hotel and hope you are in the area you can come and check out our changes!

Summary: Spacious room..good sleep!      The pool is very good and heated it perfectly suits the weather! There are enough parking spaces provided! Food is yummy! And the staff is too co-operative and sweet! I loved my stay!
Manager Response: Thank you!! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your stay! We love to hear we are the best, that is our number one goal!  Thank you for all of the compliments we truly value all of our guests and strive every day to make it a great stay.  We hope to see you again next time you are in the Brea area.

Summary: We liked everything about this hotel.  The rooms were nice and clean and we had a full kitchen, separate rooms and separate bathrooms.  The breakfasts were excellent and the pool and hot tub were nice and well maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know your stay was excellent! That is always our number one goal and love to hear every time we achieve it.  We hope to see you again next time you are in our area.

Summary Heading: Very nice, quiet, spacious rooms and Friendly Staff
Summary: We have just spent 4 nights at Chase Suite Hotel. The room was clean, very spacious and cozy. The bed was comfortable. Quiet neighbourhood at edge of Brea. The breakfast buffet was excellent and the staff was pleasant. Special thanks to Alma, Adam, Jose and the kitchen staff, who were very nice and helpful. I would definitely stay there again.

This time the so called kitchenette version was disappointing.  The under counter refrigerator rocked when you touched it and the freezer portion melted our daughter's pint of hagen daz. Eating in the room was out of the question with just the small micro wave and virtually no counter space -- many standard hotel rooms have offered as much -- but we did not need to fortunately.  The AC was dripping water onto the carpet fast enough that my wife put the trash basket under it while I went to the desk, and maintenance was there right away. But on the third day we got the bucket out again.  The French
