Summary: My husband and I stay here often for business. We always enjoy our stay. The rooms are always clean and extremely comfortable. The entire staff are always very pleasant. This hotel also offers a delicious breakfast with something for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know your stay was awesome, that's exactly what we want to hear :-) Thank you again and hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 2 lovely nights. We were very pleased with the friendly service up front and the cleanliness of the room.  This is a very well kept and family friendly place and we will definitely visit again and recommend it to family and friends.
Manager Response: Truly appreciate your comments and am so happy to hear your stay was a great one. We pride ourselves in knowing that we are always giving 120% of our efforts to make sure our guests stay is fantastic and all of their needs have been met. Thank you again!

Summary: Katie Bolson has been fabulous in setting up 12 rooms for us. she sent us pictures of our rooms, nice clean pool and BBQ area. we stayed there about 5 days and it was well worth it. Awesome breakfast every AM (included)  not only was she great up front but the entire staff followed her lead and made the stay awesome. from America checking us in to everyone that was there
Manager Response: I am so glad to hear you agree with me on the great staff we have here! They are truly amazing individuals that help make this place a great one. I'm happy to hear we were able to accommodate you and your groups needs to the T. Please come back and visit us again soon during your next visit to the Brea area!

Summary: Rates are great, rooms are great. Have stayed twice now and just love it. We'll be back. Will recommed to family and friends. when visiting from out of state. It is very clean and the staff is very helpful and pleasant.
Manager Response: So great to hear your comments! We strive for this every day! Thank you! Hope to see you again during your next visit to Brea!

Summary: Nice staff and according to my expectations. A plus for the the clean sheets and towels, the free breakfast and free wifi in the room. Perfect for short business stays when you do not spend a lot of time in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time in leaving us a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate it and hope we continue to be your hotel of choice during your next visit to the Brea area!

Summary: We stayed one night in July: pleasantly surprised! Building 2 upstairs room on back side was very quiet! Room was well appointed with nice kitchen, 2 TV's, very comfortable king bed! AC was a bit slow to cool the room. The most impressive part was the front desk experience: your employee America is an awesome asset! She dealt with several stressful situations at once and never lost her patience, she was so polite and professional, working by herself at the busy check in time. She deserves positive recognition:)  Thank you, we enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: So happy to hear about your great experience with us, that is what we're all about! And thank you for taking the time to recognize one of our great team members America! She truly is an asset to our team and appreciate her everyday. She loves to hear when she's doing a job well done and please rest assured she will see this and get extra recognition. Thank you!

Summary: My family of 3 stayed here for two nights in a "suite " that is supposed to be one of their nicer rooms. It's clean and adequate but very very run down and tired . The bathroom was kinda gross, the air conditioner was so loud we had to decide to bear it of let the room get too warm. The light fixture in the master didn't work , the blow dryer didn't work... It was pretty depressing . We won't ever be back . It was roomy and clean but grimy and old with the smallest tv in the master I have ever seen. Not worth the price.
Manager Response: First and foremost I want to thank you for letting us know your concerns and taking the time to review our hotel. I really do wish we would have known about these while you were staying here so we could have attempted to make it a better experience for us. We do have 2 types of suites one with a Full Kitchen and a 32-40" inch television, and our other suites (which are the same size) come equipped with a refrigerator, microwave and wet bar.  I don't have your information so I can't see what room type exactly you stayed in, but it sounds like it was our kitchenette suites with a slightly smaller TV than our Full Kitchen suites.   I do hope this wasn't a direct reflection on all of our amenities and services we provide and do hope you give us another chance when in the area. Feel free to contat me at kvargas@chasesuitehotels.com next time you are in town and we'll gladly make sure you get the room type for your needs. Thank you again!

Summary: We stayed one night.  Took my daughter to college orientation at Fullerton.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was clean (clean sheets and towels).   Looked like the room was updated, but still need some updates; especially the shower.  The only ice machine is in the main lobby and the internet was really slow; but it was free. The breakfast was decent and the price was right.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience with us and glad it was a positive one. We have noted your concerns and please rest assured we take them with the upmost priority, without them we cannot continue improving our services. Thank you and hope to see you again when you come and visit your daughter!

Summary: Stayed here for a week, the staff are nice. The accommodation , yes the sheets are clean & so are the towels, cant say it feels clean, an out dated grimy feel to be honest. Wanted to spend as much as as I could out rather than in the hotel. Breakfast was decent and happy hours too, would rather stay somewhere else next time!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time in leaving review. We truly appreciate your candid remarks and take them very seriously because without them we cannot continue to improve our services. Thank you again!

Summary: Stayed for a weekend in a kitchenette with a king bed.  Spacious room and well appointed. 2 flat screens.  One suggestion to the hotel staff is that the cable connection could be a bit better.  I tried to watch a world cup match and I felt like I was watching it on a tv with an antenna-  fuzzy and not as crisp as you'd like.   The comp breakfast was a nice surprise. Fluffy scrambled eggs and corned beef hash was available one morning.  It was very tasty.    We spent time in the pool and jacuzzi.  Clean and the temps were well maintained.    Had a good time. Thanks.
Manager Response: So happy to hear you had a great stay! We love to hear when our guests have been well served and taken care of as that is our number one goal! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Have stayed here many times and  will again.
Summary: Like the place. Need some outdoor sitting on the grass and trash cans in parking lot. Nice staff, clean rooms, good breakfast. Would be nice to have happy hour every night. Needs more parking. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, we hope to see you in our neck of the woods soon!

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel twice in the space of a month, each time for one night. Our experience the first time was better than the second. During both stays, we found the staff very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are spacious and the bed comfortable. But the location of the room makes a big difference! The first time we had a room on the second floor in building one. It was quiet and the air conditioner worked beautifully, keeping us comfy although it was 90 outside. The second time we were on the first floor of building two. This time we were close to some noisy equipment that drowned out the television. In addition, the A/C was sluggish, never cooling the room to our satisfaction. In both rooms, although the living areas were very clean and updated, the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your candid feedback we truly appreciate it. WIthout comments such as yours we cannot continue growing. They are truly appreciated. Thank you again!

Summary: This hotel was OK - not bad but not special.  Breakfast staff and food very good: eggs excellent, hash, sausage, juice & great coffee  (no yogurt).  Parking is very difficult and in short supply.  When we checked in late at night a new staff member was being trained.  I had already had a very long day and did not want to make small talk and pretend I did not mind waiting while she figured out the computer and key cards.  I had also asked for an upstairs room as I am a very light sleeper and was given one downstairs.  On Saturday morning 3-4 female staff members decided to have breakfast together.  The breakfast room was already jammed and having them clutter together, chat, and hang-out waiting for each other was not a good decision.  The rooms are in good condition, the TV's
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review about your stay. We truly appreciate your comments and take them very seriously. I must note that we do not allow our team members to eat at our breakfast area at any time. They have their own lunch area. There was a group in house during your stay, and I'm thinking this is where the misconception was. I apologize if you did think it was a member of our staff, but like I said, this is something that is not allowed at our hotel.  I hope this is isn't a direct reflection of our service or something that would change your mind about choosing us next time. Thank you again!

Summary: My family had to suddenly vacate a house we had recently rented when we discovered it had a mold infestation.We have been at this hotel for the entire month of May while looking for a new home. The staff has been extremely accommodating and helpful in extending our stay on an as needed basis. There was a mix up with which credit card to charge as both mine and my husbands were on file but management cleared it up quickly. Everyone I have come in contact with has been friendly and helpful at all times. Jennifer, Jose, Crystal and especially Bernalda have all been great in what has been a difficult situation for my family. A month in a hotel with a teenager and a toddler hasn't been easy! The breakfast buffet, social hour and laundry room are a great bonus and I would definitely
Manager Response: Thank YOU so much! So glad you enjoyed your stay and that we became your home away from home! Hope you come back and visit us... but under different circumstances, like a little getaway from your normal routine :-)

Summary: We booked this hotel for a Memorial Day softball tournament. We had 12 families stay at this hotel. The rooms were very nice, good layout with a bedroom, living room and full kitchen.  The bed was very comfortable.  Had a great time. The only negative comment that I have is that we asked to get our rooms close together and when we checked in, we were spread out throughout the hotel.  The lot isn't huge, but we had 12 girls who wanted to hang out and it would have been nice if we were all near each other.  The breakfast was delicious, staff was very friendly and helpful.  The pool area was nice. They have a hot tub and washers/dryers in that area if you need to do laundry.  There is no gym on site, but they give free passes to a gym down the street which was nice.  There is a
Manager Response: Thank you! We were glad to have you and your group and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: I arrived on Thursday night & they served my favorite,chili dogs at the social hr. Breakfast on Friday & Saturday morning was GREAT and so was the kitchen staff. The front desk staff were pleasant and friendly. $111 per night was steep for my grundgy room. The walls were so thin I could hear neighbors on both sides, the bedding & drapes were really nice,furniture old carpet was stained,tile,tub&sink needs updating for the price. The location is spot on for shopping,resturants,and entertainment.I stayed alone and I felt safe.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words and happy you enjoyed your stay. We also appreciate your comments and take them very serious because without them we cannot strive for better.  Thank you again and hope to see you in the near future!

Summary: My mother and I had to stay at a hotel because my condo was being fumigated.  I have 3 small birds that I did not want to board. One is very bonded to me and I really did not want her to be away from me with strangers and other birds.   I called the Ayers in diamond Bar but they would not take birds.  At first. the person I spoke to was hesitant because of the possible noise.  I may have had a small advantage since I work across the street and visitors have stayed at the Chase.  chase allowed my birds to stay in the room and charged $10\night.  Thank you Chase for allowing my birds to stay with us!
Manager Response: Very happy to hear that you had a positive experience! I'm also glad we were able to get you checked in to your room early as you had requested since i know having to leave your house early can be rather inconvenient.  We are always happy to accomodate our guest requests when we are able to :-)  Please do come back and visit, we'd love to have you back!

Summary: This place is a joke. The manager refused to accept responsibility for his screw up. We have been staying at hotel went in was very clear what card to charge they dropped the ball and charged wrong card. Instead of admitting to mistake he stutters for ten minutes when trying to lie his way out of it. Admit you made a mistake reverse the charge and I wouldn't be upset. This guy is a joke. No way he should be a manager  . A professional does not respond this way nor handle a issue with lies.
Manager Response: First and foremost wanted to thank you for taking the time to let us know your concerns. I'm happy to hear that Jose one of our Front Office Managers was able to resolve your credit card issue very promptly because issues such as these are always made a priority   I did want to take the time to point out that we always only authorize cards that are physically presented to us in order to protect our guests from fraud. We cannot authorize a card that isn't phycally swiped through our credit card system, therefore the reason why your wife's card was charged, since that was what was presented at check in. Since this incident yesterday we were able to obtain the card from you that you would like on your account and only charge this card from now on.   Thank you again and we hope you continue enjoying your stay with us!   Karla Vargas  General Manager

Summary: My family and I needed a hotel to stay in for my graduation in Southern California. This is the second year in a row that I have booked this hotel. The staff is great! We needed extra towels and blankets, the staff brought them to our room right away. Recently, I stayed in another hotel and trying to get extra towels took them forever to bring to the room!  Also, my family left their cell phone in the room by accident. We didn't realize until we were 6 hours away. Not only did the hotel staff offer to get it for us but they are accommodating us in retrieving it.  Great hotel!!!  (I normally do not write reviews but this one was worth it!)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in leaving us a review about your stay with us. I am so happy to hear it was perfect!  Forgetting a cell phone can be the worst and I'm so glad our team was able to help out and get the phone to you! Thanks again and see you next time.

Summary: Stayed here for one night while in town for a wedding. It was great for the price point. I think it might have been an apartment complex at one point based on the room layouts and pool area, but in a good way. We enjoyed our stay and the free breakfast was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you! We love to hear when our guests have been served to ours and their expecations! Hope to see you again when in the area.

Summary Heading: Free Breakfast included/ Pricey but Decent Hotel in the area :)
Summary: I am traveling for business and I booked a weekend suite room. It has a one king size bed and a small vanity close to the bathroom. It has a very small, good for one person closet w/ a sliding mirrored door that was not working well. It got stucked and I could not close the closet completely. There is a living room w/ small kitchenette w/ all plates, utensils, toaster, microwave, coffee maker, dish soap / sponge included. Also there is a little den room to work on your laptop. I was happy w/ my stay w/ some exception on the broken sliding door, unrinsed coffee maker (didn't seem to have been rinsed from previous customer), used dish sponge( must have new sponge for every customer because of sanitation issue- never know where it was used before). The toiletries could have been
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience while you were a guest with us. I am happy to hear that your overall experience was good and that you loved our breakfast!  We take all of our guests feedback very seriously and i want to thank you for bringing up to our attention where you feel we may have fallen short. Wanted to let you know that our wi-fi has been upgraded since your stay and have had no issues with our new provider.  i hope you do indeed come back and visit us on your next trip to the Brea area.

Summary: There was a little problem with assigning room upon check-in but the staff are helpful and responsive to later request. Very quite area, spacious room, and nice shower. Breakfast was just average. Overall it's a good experience and the one to go in this area.
Manager Response: Very glad to hear your stay was a good one and we thank you for making us your hotel of choice while visiting the Brea area!

Summary Heading: Better choice in the Neihbor hood
Summary: I travel to Brea every week for work and there is no better choice for the money to facilities and convenience to work place. Clean rooms and hot breakfast is what I look for when I travel. They could improve in room service and some more parking. Other wise it is a go to place when I'm in Brea!
Manager Response: Thank you for making us your home away from home while you are on business. I also want to let you know we truly do appreciate your feedback for improvement, as we take it very serious and utilitze it to improve our services. We hope to see you once again very soon and Thank you again!

Summary Heading: No Receptionist available to attend for half an hour
Summary: Hi,  Strange experience for me with this hotel. I am traveling with my family and strange thing happened is no receptionist available at desk for half an hour.  I waited for half an hour at reception along with my family and luggage in the cab waiting. Also, Called them to provide me a first floor in the morning due to luggage and kids and they Said Yes confirmed on the phone. Strange is while checking in they gave me second floor. Never will use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for bringing this to our attention while you were a guest here. I'm glad we were able to resolve any service issues while you were with us. I know that traveling all day and lost luggage can be a nightmare and waiting for our Guest Service Representative to get off the phone from reservation she was making in the back seemed like a long time especially after the day you had.  I'm so glad you we are your hotel of choice when coming to the Brea area and hope to see you very soon!

Summary: First-rate experience. I appreciated the friendly staff -- especially receptionist Krystal and  breakfast server Martha-- as well as the facility itself. More than a hotel room, it was like a homey well-equipped apartment: full kitchen, separate living quarters, everything comfortable, clean and classy. It was a business trip, so I enjoyed returning to my relaxing "home" at night. The staff each morning treated me like family, and the hot breakfast and variety of options exceeded my expectations. Although it is near a busy street, my 2nd story room was quiet. Fairly close to the beach, a plus for this city girl. Thank you, Chase Suites in Brea--can't wait to return! (For the record, no one asked me to give a review of any kind. This was my honest, unsolicited review.)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience with our hotel! We were very glad to have you and I am so happy to hear Krystal and Martha made such a great impression.. they are awesome aren't they?! We really hope to see you in our neck of the woods again very soon and Thank you again!

Summary: We stayed there for a wrestling tournament. Great customer service. Very friendly and helpful staff.   Spacious rooms with a full kitchen (fridge and freezers). Family friendly.  Very nice neighborhood and centrally located to lots of stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you! We love to hear when our guests who visit us for sports tournaments in the area had a great stay. We do hope we are once again your choice when you are back in the area for your next tournmanent!

Summary: Spacious, plenty of room.  Very comfortable beds and pillows.  We actually had a large tv in the sitting room and a smaller one in the bedroom.  My only complaint is that the towels were hard.   Service was excellent.  Breakfasts were good.  Plenty of food for our 42 boys and coaches.  Locked the pool at 10.  No sneaking in.
Manager Response: Having the 42 boys and coaches were a complete delight! We loved having you guys here and glad everything went well throughout your stay. Thank you for letting us know about the towels, we actually had switched detergent and realized the same thing! Now using our old detergent! Hopefully we will see you guys again next year.

Summary: What more can I say? Welcoming staff day or night, a comfortable room with 2 tvs and a coffee pot! Newspapers and a full breakfast in the morning. All that AND Starbucks a block away. If I were taking the kids to Disneyland, and wanted to avoid the crowd scene in Anaheim, I would stay at Chase Suites.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! So glad to hear we have accomplished our daily goals to serve you with what we believe in are the best amenities in town! Thank you again and hope to see you during your next visit.

Summary: Great place and location . The staff is super friendly , Chrystal always  a smile and a friendly hello.  Jose (manager)always accommodating and goes out of his way to make sure you enjoy your stay. The rooms are clean and the beds are cozy . I enjoy the full kitchen . I just moved to Las Vegas as already the transition was hard and staying here made it a lot smoother. I have a grand baby and when i visit this is the only place i feel ok to bring her too . Safe place !! The breakfast is hot and wonderful .  You don't feel like your staying in a hotel more like apartments .  i have stayed here over a half a dozen times this last year. Its my only choice if there not all booked up .
Manager Response: We appreciate your business each and everytime you stay with us! Thank you for being loyal to our hotel and I'm happy to hear Jose and Krystal are doing an exceptional job, because they truly are an asset to our Team.  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and see you next time!

Summary: This hotel has the smallest TV's i have ever seen in a hotel!  the hotel is nice but seems a little tired and those TV's and the smallest bathrooms and soap the size of a  quarter (really)   The Good - the pool area is great form families and the breakfast is good.
Manager Response: I truly appreciate the feedback you have for us, as a matter a fact, we are actually in the process of upgrading ALL of our TV's in the hotel . Currently in the living room we have 36-40 inch TV and smaller ones in the bedroom. We will be getting 42 inch TV's for the whole hotel very soon, and that is very exciting for us! I know you stay here quite often so I hope by the time you come back all of our upgrades have been done :-) Thank you!

Summary: Spent 1 1/2 days at the hotel and needed a morning shuttle connection to nearby business. The (pre-arranged) shuttle driver was not there (Unfortunate), but no problem for the manager (Crystal) at the hotel. She herself got the bus key jumped in and drove me to my destination.... Wow, that was a welcome surprise and shows the general service friendly approach in this particular hotel. Similarly positive I rate the breakfast (basic), and the evening happy hour (2 alcoholic beverages on the house) with snacks. An efficient pleasant stay for a great price.
Manager Response: So great to hear about your experience! I'm so glad you were able to take advantage of all of our amenities. I love hear when our managers go above and beyond (which is what they do on a daily basis) but hearing about it via Tripadvisor really makes their day! Thank you! We hope in your next visit to the Brea area you choose us once again.

Summary Heading: Our Experience at Chase Suite Hotel Brea
Summary: The hotel is older than the pictures portray.  We were traveling with a pet and the room they gave us was on the street side which is very noisy and the room had an odor to it.  I asked to change our room but was told they had no more pet rooms available.  Had to go out and buy some room fresher.  They only change your towels and sheets every four days unless you ask for service.  The sink plug on the vanity could not be used because the mirror blocked the handle from being able to pull it up.  The TV's are very small.  For the price of the room and extra charge for the dog, we were disappointed in our accommodations.  It was hard to get in an out of the location and there is limited parking.  Had trouble getting WiFi access, worked some days and not others.  The breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. It is comments such as yours that allow us to continue growing. Please rest assured that all of your comments have been address and noted. Thank you for taking the time to inform us and we hope you allow us to serve you another time while visiting Brea, and I do hope the next time you will feel better served, which is all we strive for.

Summary: i stayed at chase  with my family for 1 month , great place  peaceful good breakfast  clean room  best daily service  and what i saw in the photos when i was booking  it was really true..nice kitchen with new appliances .
Manager Response: Thank you so much taking the time to review our hotel and letting us know about your great experience with us, we love hearing about it! Thanks again and hope to see you in the near future on your next visit to Brea!

Summary: Great customer service and great price. Great room service. Free com primary breakfast and great rooms. I definitely suggest people to stay here. Very friendly. Very hospitality. Great discounts. Have kitchen living room and fireplace. Amazing vacation stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for letting us know about your stay! We are always ecstatic to hear that our guests have been well served while staying at our "home." Thank you again and hope to see you again in the near future on your travels to the Brea area.

Summary: We are a family of 6 from Arizona who went on a mini vacation to Knotts Berry Farm over Valentines weekend. Chase Suites was close to freeways, shopping, food, and entertainment. We arrived early and our room was not ready yet so we went to Carbon Canyon Regional Park to pass the time. I must say that the park was just beautiful!   Chase Suites accommodated us by not putting feather pillows and comforters in the bedroom (we have allergies to feathers). The suite (room 526) was immaculately clean and super comfortable. The full kitchen had all the amenities) of home: stove, dishwasher, microwave, fridge, sink, dishes, utensils, pot/pan.  I didn't even know there was a sofa bed until we got there; so EVERYONE slept comfortably! I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your awesome experience with us! I'm so glad to hear you were able to take advantage of all of our amenities and you were able to explore our beautiful city! Thank you again and hope to see you again in your next visit to the area!

Summary: This was a great hidden treasure in Brea, California. My husband and I traveled to see our son play basketball for a tournament and the service was friendly and helpful at all hours of the night. Breakfast was hot and ready and the rooms were clean every time we arrived back to our rooms. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel! We are so happy to hear when our guest have been well served as this is always our ultimate goal each and every day!  Happy to hear you will choose us again on your next visit to the area!

Summary: Jennifer, I love you. Will you marry me?   Just kidding, super simple and VERY kind staff. Everyone I spoke to was great. Big rooms, as good service as anywhere else, tv's were kind of small. Location amazing, parks, coffee shops and starbucks for myself within 8-9 minute walk.  I very much enjoyed my stay, Jennifer took the time to make small talk and make everyone feel easy and good mood-ed.  Another staff member helped arrange a cab, not a big deal, but so willingly and warmly.  Good stay.
Manager Response: Great to hear you had a good experience during your stay with us as this is what we strive for each and every day to provide for our guests. We hope to see you again on your next visit to the area!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here during a business trip in December 2013. Very good place, friendly staff. The suite I had was excellent and very big. Everything was available, microwave, fridge, cooking plate, dishes, glasses, etc... Place was clean and everything worked fine. Breakfast was very good compared to other hotels i had stayed. They have laundry facility on site. I did not use swimming pool of Jacuzzi so no evaluation there. Staff was very friendly and helpful, except for housekeeping who kicked me out of the room while I was working... :-)  I would certainly recommend this location to other people.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel, we are glad to hear your stay was an enjoyable one and we hope to see you again during your next visit to Brea!  Thank you again!

Summary: The phenomenal service began the moment I first wrote Chase's sales department regarding blocking rooms for my wedding. Katie was immediately responsive and accommodating. Never having met her until the day before the wedding. Upon checking in, I heard the same treatment of service was given to each and everyone of my guests. The warm welcome from all of the staff did not stop there. They offered complimentary shuttle services from the hotel to our church and from the church to our venue at Black Gold Golf Club (up to 5 trips). Also, a hot breakfast and although they are no Five Star Hotel their service certainly was. This hotel is perfectly placed between the Brea Mall and Yorba Linda. I thank the concierge/Front Desk, Jose, and all of the staff for alleviating a lot of stress
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to hear you had such a great stay and we were so happy to have you and your guests with us during such a special time for you! Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience and hopefully when in the area you can come back and visit us again!

Summary: In all our years of staying in various parts of this country we have never gone into a room that did not have a multiple drawer piece of furniture for T shirts undearwear and the like. When we called to find put why the person told my husband to hang it in the closet. She also told him that some rooms have that particular piece of furniture but ours did not. WHY?The person who checked us in would not let me do it just because my name was not on the reservation I had to make my husband get out of the car who at the time had a back back and could hardly walk to complete the check in. The room was clean the couch & chair pretty comfortable. We left early only stayed one night instead of two
Manager Response: I am very happy to hear your stay was comfortable while you were here. All of our rooms come equipped with the furniture needed to accomodate a comfortable experience, however I do want to apologize if that felt short to your expectations.   I also wanted to apologize for your check in experience, please rest assured we take extreme privacy measures, therefore that is why we ask that the person who's name is in the reservation is the person who is checking in. We always allow multiple names in the reservation as long as we are informed, that is why we went ahead and added your name to the room once you were checked in, in order to be able to accomodate any of your needs.  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, it is comments such as yours that allow us to continue improving our services.

Summary: I stayed here many years ago when it was new and a different name - i remember it being in much better shape.  rooms were nice but bathrooms could use some work.  B-fast is very good and freshly made (pancakes)  but the sitting area is way to small.  pool is great for kids and adults alike.  nice stay if you can get a room back off the road.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are so happy to hear you were able to enjoy our great breakfast!!  We hope to see you in the near future on your next travels to Brea!

Summary: I stayed at Chase Suite Hotel Brea for 3 weeks.  The suites themselves are fine, the beds are really good, although the heating system can be quite loud. l got ants in the bathroom the last day, not sure why since I did not keep food in. They provide soap and shampoo which is nice, but the shampoo was terrible for my hair (so much dandruff, when I usually do fine...). The nights we were there the hospitality hour served a good variety,each night something different..one of the nights they had a baked potato bar....they set out fresh veggies and chips and salsa and free beer and wine.  Staff was friendly and very accommodating when we told them we needed a first floor room because we were traveling with kids.  Will stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: I always love to hear when our guests rave about our breakfast! Thank you! We take pride in making it fresh everyday in hope that everyone loves it! Glad you did! Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to review our hotel.  See you again on your next visit!

Summary: Just spend two weeks at this hotel and must say that it's always a pleasure to stay there. The staff is very friendly and helpful, rooms are very clean as well as the grounds. Great breakfast with friendly staff. Great working ac for my needs (better then home) I highly recommend this Hotel to friends and family! Besides this Hotel is close to shops, grocery stores, movies and freeways, etc. On Fridays they have Food Trucks for the guest, I find that to be a plus for us guests!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review about our hotel. I am happy to hear your experience with us was a great one, as we are always striving to exceed our guests expectations. I hope to see you again when you are visiting the Brea area!

Summary: I stay here at least once a month on business.Since I try to save my company money by shopping for a good deal I decided to give Chase Suites a try and I was very satisfied with the price and service.They offer a good breakfast and a free happy hour for those long days. I'm always pleased with the selection for breakfast as they mix it up and everything is always fresh. The rooms are spacious and clean. Whenever colleagues ask me where to stay when they go out to our Brea offices I always recommend the Chase Suites
Manager Response: First of all thank you for your continued business to our hotel! So glad to hear that we are your "home away from home"  Thank you again and thank you for your kind comments, see you very soon in the near future on your next stay with us!

Summary: From the moment we arrived a remarkable experience. A great front desk staff, helpful management, breakfast hosts, and friendly housekeepers.  Comfortabel, clean, spacious suites.Great breakfast too.  Pool area could be larger but worked!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, we truly appreciate your kind words! Very glad to hear you had the experience we strive everyday to give our guests!

Summary: Rates were good. All employees were friendly and welcoming. Rooms were clean and very spacious. Everything (food and fun) was with in a short driving distance. Free breakfast was delicious! I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family!
Manager Response: We are always happy to hear that our guests have been served the way they deserve to be because this is what we strive for each and every day.  Thank you for your kind words and see you very soon on your next visit to our hotel!

Summary: I have stayed here a few times now when visiting LA.  It is very close to shops, Disney, Knotts Farm, only about an hour from Universal studios too.  Plenty of parking, lovely suites, clean and spacious.  Breakfast is included in the price although some people will complain that there is not enough variety, I found there was plenty to choose from and for a family with children a great start to the day.  Pool is a little small but again enough space to have dip in!  I love this place and will always go back.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your positive feedback. I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff provided you with the service that you deserve once again.  The team and I look forward to seeing you again during your future visits to our lovely "home away from home"

Summary: I was a bit wary about staying here after reading the reviews , but actually it was quite comfortable ! Yes, it is a bit worn/dated BUT it's bad at all. The service desk is professional and friendly, house keeping is very friendly, everything was clean and it was roomy. I will definitely recommend this place to friends and come back again myself.
Manager Response: I wanted to thank you for taking the time to give us feedback! We are so happy to hear that your stay with us was a success, as this is what we strive for each and every day.  Thank you again and hope to see you in the very near future! :-)

Summary: Worn and Noisy   Air conditioner compressors for units are arrayed under the first floor windows. I was worried about the exterior noise but the motor on the interior fan sounds like an idling truck and drowns out the external racket. The tiny bent tubing dining table is barely big enough to hold the No Smoking letter from management. The flat screen video screens would work better as desktop computer displays. There is no stove or oven in the “kitchenette”. Oddly, with the miniaturization, the rooms are sparsely populated with furniture. The place might have been nice in an earlier era of suite hotels but is cheesy by today’s standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and candid feedback. I apologize that we did not meet your expectations while your visit to our hotel. It is through comments such as yours that help us continue to grow.   I wanted to apologize if there was any miscommunication between our Suite types. We have Full Kitchen Suites as well as Suites with Kitchenettes.  The difference between them is that the Full Kitchen Suite has just that, a Full Kitchen, Full Refrigetor, Stove, Oven, Microwave and Dishwasher. Our Kitchenette Suites feature, a Wetbar, Microwave and Mini Fridge.  In size they are the same, however there is a difference in price, Kitchenettes being lower in price, possibly why that would be the first choice for some of our guests.   I would appreciate it if you could please contact me directly to further discuss your concerns. Please contact me at kvargas@chasesuitehotels.com. The team and I look forward to meeting your expectations during your next visit with us.

Summary: We needed a room for a one stay while in Orange County.  We booked this hotel because of the area and the price range.  We got much more than expected for the cost.  The room was very clean, larger than expected, with a comfy bed. Don't miss out on the free buffet breakfast, either.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us feedback . I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our team provided you with the service that you deserve, after all that is what we strive for!  The team and I look forward to having you join us during your future visits on property

Summary: This is NOT a safe hotel. In fact, it's not a hotel; it's a motor lodge. We were in town on business for a two night stay. We checked in and unpon examination of our room and noticing neighboring patrons, we realized that this was not a safe place to stay. The room was tidy but in dire need of repair. The sofa had obvious "stain" on the back cushions. Hair on the bathroom floor. There were obvious signs of wear and tear that I could not get passed. The clincher? The half inch gap under the door. I realized that it would not be difficult for bugs to crawl through. We were traveling with a lot of expensive gear for our work and the thought of leaving our room to go to the neighboring mall, was totally out of the question. When checking out fifteen minutes after check-in, we were
Manager Response: First and foremost, I would like to apologize on behalf of our hotel and team for your experience at our hotel. I would have loved to have heard about your experience as we are in the business of serving guests and having them leave with a positive experience, not the opposite. Please feel free to contact me at kvargas@chasesuitehotels.com so we can discuss this matter and hopefully rectify any service issues you may have come across.  We take pride in our service and amenities we provide and when we are not meeting guests expectations, we strive to make it better. I truly do appreciate your candid feedback as it only allows our product to get better and our team to grow from these experiences.

Summary Heading: "The word Suite, I do not think it means what you think it means. ..."
Summary: Nice place with full kitchen - perfect if you need a place for a major baking/cooking project!  Quick check in and quiet rooms.  Great for the price.  Tiny flat screen TV's; the smallest I've seen in a hotel actually.  It served it's purpose for us though.   However, the room had a VERY strong scent of ammonia or cleaning agents.  It wasn't pleasant and I did not like housekeeping being aggressive at the door in the morning.  After a couple of no's and no, thank you, I finally had to yell, "GO AWAY".  The guy then said, "Ok".  An elderly housekeeper was taking her break under our window which was opened and she was smoking.  So that wasn't cool either.  We were in room 127.  After touring most of the buildings, we finally found it.  It was on the second floor! lol - weird.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel.  First and foremost I want to apologize for your experience as I hope it doesn't prevent you from staying with us in the future.   I did do some investigations in regards to the comment about one of our housekeepers smoking as it was very alarming for me to hear this since that has NEVER happened, It was a actually a guest who stays with us regularly and was in her work uniform and I could see where she could have been mistaken as a member of our staff, but I'd still like to apologize for the impression of us, it would have taken me back as well!  I'm so glad to hear you loved our product and service as this is what we strive for daily. I do hope we see you again in the very near future!

Summary: Good sized rooms and kitchenettes. Small pool and small parking lot.  Terrible breakfast. No convenient ice or snacks/drinks. Old and outdated decor. Good location near lots of restaurants, shopping and freeways. Nothing special...
Manager Response: First and foremost thank you for your review. We truly appreciate your candid comments as without them we can not grow. Thank you again and hope to see you in the near future :)

Summary Heading: Here for an extended stay - medical treatment?  This is it!
Summary: We hosted a family in from Africa here for emergency medical treatment. It was very important they would be accommodated and receive maximum sensitivity of the staff. The staff and management of the Chase Suites did not disappoint us. They gave our family the best of hospitality and cared for them with friendliness and eagerness to help any need.   All were wonderful - staff and Management. THANK YOU!!!  ROOM TIP: We had the one-bedroom with double beds; it's a full suite, with a full sized kitchen, a T.V. in the living room and bedroom.  Units with a fireplace are a little wider in the living room layout, and although the same square footage as the no-fireplace room, I like the layout a little better. The ground floor unit worked much better for the family as they had two
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kinds words, you hit what our main purpose is, to take care of every one of our guests as an extension of our family and make them feel right at home. We truly appreacite you taking the time to review our hotel. I have shared your words with the rest of the team and it made them ecstatic that what they do every day DOES make a difference!

Summary: I had a very quiet room away from Imperial Highway which was spacious with a separate living area/kitchen, bedroom, walk-in dressing area and small bathroom. Kitchen was nicely equipped with fridge, microwave, crockery, etc. Work area and free WLAN. Comfortable sitting area with TV. Another TV in bedroom. Very friendly and helpful staff, dealt with queries, etc. very promptly. Delicious breakfast with different freshly prepared items such as hash brownies or Mexican omelette each day. Social hour with drinks and snacks on weekday evenings to help you chill out. Nice pool, jacuzzi and pool area to relax in.
Manager Response: So great to hear about your wonderful stay with us!  We love receiving feedback, especially great one!  Thank you for allowing us to serve you while you were visiting Brea and hopefully we will see you in very near future.

Summary: The room was a nice sized room and was in decent shape. We had ask for extra towels almost everyday. Housekeeping needs to put more towels in the room. We had to ask for paper towels and dish soap upon our arrival. Something needs to be done about smoking in the courtyards and outside the room doors.We had to keep our door closed as there was a gentleman who was constantly smoking outside and always smelled like smoke outside our room. Parking was a nightmare at night. The breakfast was decent. The Happy Hour not the best. The rates are a little pricey compared similar properties.
Manager Response: First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We take all feedback and grow from it everyday.  I apprecieate you bringing up the smoking in the outside courtyard as we do urge our smoking guests to be mindful of other guest and not smoke near their room and only in the designated smoking areas since our rooms are 100% non-smoking.  I hope this doesn't reflect on our overall service and you will visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Could have been better for this price range
Summary: Pros - budget rates, pet friendly, breakfast included, happy hour too, friendly staff  Cons - older property, Terrible parking especially at night   Overall, just an okay place. Our requirement was to have a hotel that allows pets and this one does. Breakfast was decent. Not a big fan on their happy hour though. The room was clean but most of the appliances were dated and could use a change. We could clearly hear the conversations from next room but I guess it went both ways but that's not unusual for budget hotels too.  Staff was very friendly, prompt and helpful for service. For a $100+charge, I would have expected the rooms to be a little better though.  Parking lot is very poorly designed and it was very difficult to park at night with a ton of big cars using up the narrow
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, we truly appreciate all feedback as it allows us to continue growing and without it we wouldn't strive for the best.  I'm so happy to hear you received the Service you deserve as that is what we pride ourselves in.  Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Great Stay But Upkeep Was Lacking
Summary: This is a great place to stay if you need a nice sized room in the OC.   The hotel staff was super friendly, the room was nice and comfortable, but the maintenance was a little lacking. I could see the wallpaper starting to peel in the bathroom and vanity area. Also, there was either a leaky pipe or rain water runoff problem that it looked like wasn't being addressed outside our building. It was creating a mini-moat that we had to keep our 2 toddler children away from (you know kids).   Other than that, you can't beat the price that they charge for a one bedroom w/ a separate living area and kitchenette.   All the national chains in that area will cost you at least $30 more once you factor in parking. Also, our room didn't look like the one in the picture. We made do, but they
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your candid feedback we truly appreciate when we hear our guests have been well served and happy and also where we can improve, that is all we work towards here at "Our Home" . We value all feeback and always work towards a better product and better service but couldn't do it without guests as yourselves!  Thank you again and hope to see you very soon!

Summary: My son is on a travel ball team and stayed here.  It was last minute as the brackets didn't come up the Weds' night before Saturday play so we were time crunched.  Greg Rahn, the sales manager was extremely helpful.  He was great with communications, understood our challenges and was more than accommodating.  The suites were comfortable for one night.  Not quite the updated hotel rooms.  Very close to major shopping areas and eateries.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate you taking the time to review your stay, we enjoyed having your your team and hope to see you very soon!

Summary Heading: Just what we were looking for
Summary: We have been traveling a lot recently for family stuff so we are limited on funds but I don't want to bother friends or sleep on an air mattress. So chase suites had great reviews and a great 48 hr special online price and it has been perfect. Clean, polite staff, yummy breakfast. It is a nice change to be in a big suite instead of a reg hotel room. And the breakfast layout was the usual but these are real eggs, not microwave prepared ones. Sometimes you can tell it isn't a real kitchen but just a few microwaves to heat food up which is fine but this bacon was crispy. It does look like an apt complex from the outside but inside everything was clean and fresh which is what is truly impt to us
Manager Response: So awesome to hear you had a great time at "Our Home" see you soon!

Summary Heading: For the business traveller - it's home away from home
Summary: Stayed here many times over several years - two weeks at a time. Friendly and helpful staff, clean rooms and a great pool.  Always enjoyed the breakfast too.  Thanks folks!  Keep up the great work.  Close to the shops too.
Manager Response: So happy so hear your feedback, it is a testament to what we strive for and I'm always happy to hear that we are doing things right. We truly appreciate your business and of course your review of our hotel, which is our "home away from home" too and we take pride in it as if it WAS our home, which means every guest that comes through our doors is a personal guest of ours.  Thank you so much and hope to see you again next year!

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, but sloooow WiFi
Summary: My family and I (including 3 dogs) stayed here for 14 days while waiting for our new home to close escrow and have minor improvements made.  As others have mentioned, the hotel is in a quiet part of Brea, surrounded by business parks.  Despite this, the hotel is very close to shops and restaurants, and reasonably close to the Brea Mall, 57 and 91 Freeways if you're looking to get around Orange County.    The grounds are clean, pool and spa well maintained, and the hotel offers "happy hour" in the evenings and breakfast in the mornings, which we took advantage of most nights.  As a free amenity, the happy hour and breakfasts are great, but don't expect too much variety.  Our suite itself was spacious with a nice living room, kitchen, and comfortable beds.  The suite also had a
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We truly enjoyed having you and your family at our "home" and thank you for being so patient while we figured out what was going on with the wifi in your room.   I'm glad you enjoyed your stay and I hope to see you again in the near future at our neck of the woods, your family and yourself were truly a delight! :)

Summary: What can I say?  I reserved the Chase Suites for my wife and sister who were visiting their aunt in Yorba Linda.  They phoned me when they arrived to tell me how wonderful their two room suite and the hotel grounds were.  The next day I heard about there large their fantastic breakfast and how close they were to restaurants and shopping.   Also, "everyone at the hotel is so friendly." My wife travels a lot.  She is quite demanding when it comes to a hotel room.  If she knew how little I paid for her suite, she might have never considered this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! So glad your wife and sister had a great time with us. Always glad to hear when guests love our phenomenal breakfast! Hope to see you all during your next visit to Brea!

Summary: On a two night stay, my husband and I left the Chase Suites knowing we won't be staying here again.  The experience was not bad, it was just not worth our money.  The hotel is in a great, quiet area, close to shopping, restaurants, and with easy access to major freeways.  For us, however, that was not enough to overlook several issues we had.  When checking in, the keys to our room did not work.  We brought them back to front desk, and they still did not work.  A manager walked back to the room with my husband where she was able to get the keys to work by quickly entering them over avd over.  Shouldn't a key to a room just work on the first try?  Second night, we get back from 13 hours on the road and keys don't work again! This time, computer demagnetized them because it
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback about your recent stay at our hotel. It is our goal to exceed guest expectations, and when they have not been met or exceeded we take your comments very seriously.   I wish you would have let us know of your discontent while you were here so you could have given us the opportunity to do something about it.  I was the one who personally walked with your husband to your room to make sure your keys worked. I did have it put the key in twice with the first key, but the second key worked perfect on the first try, as with any room key reader it may take more than one try due to dust or water that gets inside the reader especially since we are an outdoor property, that being the reason why the key might have to be insterted more than once from time to time.  I did notice your booked a Traditional Queen room, which we only have about 3 of in the whole property, we pride ourselves in being a Suite property, however we do accomadate guests that are looking for less expensive accomadations, therefore having traditional hotel rooms available. All of our regular suites come equipped with a full kitchen or a Mini Kitchettes, which are twice the size of a regular hotel room.  I urge you to give us another chance, and come stay with us in one of our typical rooms (a Suite) which is only a $10 difference from the Traditional hotel room you stayed in.  I promise you, you won't be dissapointed!    Thank you again for your feedback we truly do appreciate it!

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, and feels like home.
Summary: Our family really enjoyed out two night stay at Chase Suite Hotel in Brea.  The room was clean, the staff was friendly and accommodating, and there was plenty of room for five of us.  The pool was clean and the water warm, and the complementary breakfast buffet was delicious.  Great hotel at a great price.  We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for your kind words! We truly appreciate them! It is our pleasure to serve you and are always looking for ways to better our service. This goes to show our efforts are always making a difference. Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed here one night.  The hotel was located in a great area, close to shopping and restaurants. They were strict about enforcing any noise rules (you sign a paper at check-in about this) which I always appreciate, since I like a quiet time when I get away from home.The room we stayed in was spacious and comfortable, with a living room and kitchen separated by a door from the bedroom/bathroom area.  There was a breakfast buffet in the morning which was very good, with lots of variety.  I would definitely stay here again and recommend the place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, your comments are truly appreciated, without them we cannot continue to improve our services. Hope to see you in your next visit to the Brea area!

Summary: My mother and I stayed four nights while visiting family and were very comfortable.  The accomodations were better than expected.  All of the staff was very helpful and courteous.  We will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel . We are ecstatic to hear your enjoyed your stay and await your return in the future :-)  Sincerely Karla Vargas

Summary: We booked a room through Hotwire, because we just wanted somewhere cheap to stay, and weren't too concerned about quality.  We chose this particular selection because it advertised that it would be a suite and it had a good location to where we were going (In case you are unaware, when booking through Hotwire you don't actually see the name of the hotel until after you book the room, you just see the amenities).  After the name showed up, I went straight to the hotel's website and I was pretty pleased with what we had been given.  The website advertised all suites, and they looked very nice.  When we checked in, the girl at the front desk was very polite, welcomed us and went through the check-in process and issued our keys, no problems what so ever.  Then we got to the room...
Manager Response: I am dissapointed to hear that your hotel stay was not what you expected. I truly am very sorry as this is not very common for us. Without making excuses, I urge you to book directly through the hotel next time, so we can guarantee your room type etc.. when guests book through another website (other than our direct site) it makes it tough on our end to accomadate them with the room type they desire, when they only offer Run of House, which is typically a Non-Suite Room.    Thank you for your feedback and I hope your previous stay is not an example of what our hotel is all about, because we are not in the business of dissatisfied guests.

Summary Heading: A very comfortable place to stay.
Summary: We have been there before and decided to try it again. The beds were comfortable. The suites were spacious. The staff was friendly. Would recommend it.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent value, wonderful rooms, spotless, great breakfast
Summary: We stayed 5 nights at the Chase Suites in Brea, CA while we visited Disneyland.  We were surprised that the room was even better than we expected.  It was tastefully decorated, very roomy and impeccably clean.   The daily breakfast was very nice.  Housekeeping cleaned our room and provided clean sheets and towels every single day (we have noticed that some motels do not give you clean linens every day)  Our only negative at all was that since the layout is like a courtyard layout with all the units facing a common area, early risers who stood outside to chat and smoke were a little noisy.  We were just so happy with our stay and would recommend Chase Suites to anyone who wants a reasonably priced suite.  With free breakfast, afternoon reception, free wireless, free parking,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Chase Suite Hotel Brea!!  We are truly happy that we met all of your needs and appreciate the feedback. I'm a little sad, I didn't get to meet you and your wife during your stay, but there is always a next time!  Thanks again, and also thank you for the pictures!  Karla Vargas General Manager

Summary: Well kept older facility with gobs of space and everything necessary to live there, much less stay there. Full kitchen, stove and necessary utensils all there. Clean orderly and an unusually competent and helpfull staff. We stay at Disney/Menage/Ayres frequently. Ayres couldn't accomodate us so we found this property. Obvious upgrades in bedding and electronics ave made this an incredible value at about $100. Call Rosa at the front desk. She's about the most helpful and good natured person I've met lately in our somewhat frequent travels. That includes Disney/Menage/Ayres & others.  We booked other dates at checkout. It's a winner.
Manager Response: Such a pleasure to speak to you yesterday and I'm happy to know we'll be having you back this weekend. Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, as without our guests feedback we can not work on continously improving our services...see you very soon!  Karla Vargas General Manager

Summary: Had to go to Brea for a community event and decided to stay at this place. Suites were clean and specious. Surrounding area was also nice and quiet. Great surroundings for a quick morning walk. Breakfast was simple but adequate. There was nothing here I can complain about.  The only interesting thing was AAA rate was higher than regular rate. so, watch out. AAA doesn't always get you the best rate.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very spacious upstairs room. Very comfortable beds. All amenities were in working condition in the room (ie, refrigerator. microwave, dishwasher,etc) Very tasty breakfast bar with a nice ambiance. Very enjoyable stay, with a helpful staff. Have already booked our stay over the thanksgiving weekend!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, looking foward to seeing you again this weekend!  Karla Vargas General Manager

Summary: I stay here often. The main reason is it's close proximity to where I need to be when I'm in Brea on business. The added benefits are the spacious rooms with a kitchenette or a full kitchen in some rooms. It feels more like an apartment than a hotel. While the rooms are not what I would consider top notch, they are nice, comfortable, and did I mention spacious? Great rates also. Wifi is a little slow. The bathrooms could use some freshening up. The breakfast is much better than the offerings at most other mid-range hotels. Also have a happy hour in the evenings (during the week only) with beer and wine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor Review,  your comments are truly appreciated as they help us improve our services. Hope to see you very soon :-)  Karla Vargas General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice family hotel- great in-room cooking facilities
Summary: Nice welcoming hotel- mainly for families. Nice ambiance- breakfasts are free but sparse and over-subscribed- recommend Millies Restaurant in Brea Mall if you get fed up (every pun intended!). Rooms are open out access from outside via ground floor door or upstairs. Suites have 3 rooms (including bathroom)- really liked the rooms- every facility and you can order obligatory pizzas etc. from outside establishments. Well-frequented but smallish pool ws well used by families.  Nice friendly staff- nice clientele also...mix of out-of-towners and US residents.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments! They are truly appreciated! See you soon!  Karla Vargas General Manager

Summary Heading: Embarrasing Pool-Hottub area- Horrible Breakfast-Horrible Parking- Poor Service -Bad for Kids
Summary: After much searching for a good suite, I thought I would try this hotel. We stayed here four nights.  Honestly,the room was clean and the bed was comfy.  This is what kept us there.  The pool is smaller than the one in my yard and was GREEN and DIRTY like you would expect at a Super 8, but worse..  The hot tub was filthy and the water was so low that the pump was sucking air.  The pool area was so FULL of people in such a small space that we couldn't even go swimming.  The breakfast line was LONG and it closes at 9am.  Honestly, that's way too early if you're on vacation and have a family to get up and ready.  Also, the food was NEVER NOT ONE TIME full.  We had to wait constantly for the cooks to fill it back up.  Wouldn't you know after a few weeks of offering a breakfast how
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Chase Suite Hotel Brea on your recent visit.   I had a chance to read the review that you recently completed. I was concerned to hear about your experience with our hotel. We strive to accommodate all of our guests and their needs, and I was disappointed to hear about the problems you encountered. I know that does not change your experience but I hope that you can feel confident that we heard your concern and are definitely doing something about it.  I wish we would have known at the time of your stay the problems you encountered, that way we would have had the opportunity to make them better.  I apologize that for the duration of your stay we had 4 groups in-house and the hotel was quite busy. This is by all means NO EXCUSE to what you encountered while you stayed with us and I would love to attempt at making it better for you.  You made your reservation through Expedia, therefore I have no email address to contact you through. Please email me at kvargas@chasesuitehotels.com or call me at  714-579-3200 at your earliest convenience to try to resolve any dissatisfactions you had with our hotel. We are not in the business of dissatisfied guests and try to exceed our guests expectations, that is why when something like this happens we take it very seriously.   I apologize again for the problems, and thank you for taking the time to let me know about them. Without your guest feedback we cannot continue to improve our services. I look forward to your email or phone call.  Thank you  Karla Vargas-Flores General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel and staff. I would go back if I return to the area.
Summary: I travel quite a bit and this hotel is a gem. The staff was responsive. The beds and bedding are soothing. The decorating is updated. The breakfast and breakfast staff was great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words, they are truly appreciated, without them we cannot continue to improve our services. Hope to see you in your next visit to the Brea area!

Summary: We have stayed here twice and appreciate the large, spacious rooms and friendly staff. The breakfast was adequate and surprised to discover eggs and bacon.  In this price range, we didn't expect to get rooms this large with such comfortable beds. This enterprise seems dedicated to listening to fellow travelers and is always trying to improve their already excellent service. I travel a lot and for the money, this place is great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, we do take under consideration every guests feedback and try to improve our services constantly. It's comments like yours that keep us on the right track. Thank you for your visit and hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: The room stunk and was not clean
Summary: I would never stay here again.  When I checked in the clerk was irritated that I was so late (about 11pm) and there was no parking in the lot.  He told me to park across the way in another business's lot.   The room had a horrible smell and I had to leave the windows open all night even though I was on the ground floor and there was now no security.  Bathroom was dirty.
Manager Response: First and foremost, I want to start thank you for your comments as without them we cannot improve.  I want to apologize for the issues you encountered while you stayed at  our hotel. I understand that this does not change the experience but I do want to assure you we are doing something about it.
